Description:
Elekk is a Mastodon instance by gamers, for gamers. Games of any type are welcome here - computer games, console games, tabletop games, etc. - as well as game development of any kind. Whether you make games, play games, or some of both, this is the place for you.

EXCEPT: the ideologies of Gamergate and the alt-right are unconditionally unwelcome here. This is an actively diverse and feminist space, and GG and the alt-right are a rejection of that. Any harassment or posts that represent GG or the alt-right, in the sole judgment of the administration, will be removed and may result in suspension of your account.

Elekk is not hosted in the EU and does not recognize the authority of the EU to govern the internet.

Support

You can support Elekk financially by contributing via Patreon (recurring).

Guidelines

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of Elekk.xyz. They are here to provide you with insight into our philosophy and content moderation policies.


As a courtesy, if you post images to Elekk that you didn't create, please include credit to the creator, and preferably a link to the image's source.


Accounts that automate their posting, including but not limited to bots and cross-posters from other social media, should mark automated posts as Unlisted instead of Public, unless you have the explicit consent of the administrators.


The following types of content may be removed from the public timeline at the discretion of the moderator.

  • Excessive advertising
  • Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions
  • Untagged gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Deliberately inflammatory content with the intent to trigger or hurt others, at the discretion of administration.

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service.

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service.

  • Sexual depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
  • Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism (i.e. the Nazi party), the political far or "alt"-right, or Gamergate
  • Content illegal in the United States

Any conduct intended to stalk other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, identified at the sole discretion of the administrator and moderators, is also disallowed, and subject to action up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors:

  • Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed.
  • Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment.
  • Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.


Mutant Standard

This instance might use Mutant Standard emoji made by Dzuk, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License. I'm honestly not sure whether or not we do, but it never hurts to be thorough.


GDPR and CCPA

Elekk uses cookies to maintain your login session and for no other reason.

Elekk stores your email address, which is used as your account name to log you in. Your email is not visible to anyone but the administrators of the site. We do not send you email unless you request it.

Elekk has no advertising partners. Because of the nature of a federated social network, we share your non-private posts with other servers. However, we do not share your personal data, or aggregated non-personal data, with anyone. We do publish statistical data about the entire body of Elekk users as a way for others to measure the health of our instance, but your individual information cannot be extracted from those figures.


Scraping

Each user of Elekk.XYZ retains all copyright to the original content of posts they make on Elekk.XYZ. You may not make a copy for any purpose other than the normal functioning of ActivityPub federation and the RSS feeds generated by the Mastodon software of any content originally posted to Elekk.XYZ without acquiring the affirmative consent of the administrator for each post you wish to copy. If you maintain a copy or depiction of any post that originated on Elekk.XYZ, you must regularly check back with the server to determine whether that post has been changed or removed, and you must update your copy or depiction to reflect any changes to the post, or remove your copy or depiction if the post has been removed.


Help, I've been suspended!

If you were an Elekk user and your account was suspended:

Elekk's moderators use account suspension as a measure of last resort. If we suspended your account, the decision was final, in part because we cannot recover your account; suspension irrevocably destroys all data associated with a Mastodon account.

If you are a remote user and you believe your account or your instance was suspended by Elekk:

As this policy has recently been abused, it has been revoked. Remote suspensions are now final, until further notice.
topic: Elekk: Gameing and Other Delightful Pursuits

Description:
üá¨üáß English version

üè° Presentation

EQS is a Mastodon instance/server for fans of little ponies, that has been online since May 8th, 2017. It is part of the fediverse, a large decentralized social network.

‚ö†Ô∏è Due to spam, accounts are approved manually. Please be clear in your registration message, or you will be considered a robot. If you did not receive the registration email, try looking in the junk folder, or use another address. Indeed, some mailbox providers may block us.

If you wish, you can financially help the instance on Liberapay (It's a bit like Patreon or Tipeee, but free).

ü¶Ñ Our friends (Who speak English)
  • Canterlot Comics, a webcomic library

üìë Server rules

Rules are necessary to ensure a healthy community. The general rule of thumb here is to respect others and to use your common sense. Simply put, don't be a d*ck.

  1. Illegal content under French and European law (Including off-site links) is not permitted. You are legally responsible for the content that you post.
  2. Hate speech is not allowed. This includes racism, xenophobia, LGBTphobia, queerphobia, fatphobia, etc...
  3. Be pony-like ! Don't harass others, and don't encourage it.
  4. To keep the timeline easy-to-read, don't post spam messages or excessively shitpost.
  5. User accounts may not be used solely for advertising. You can still register as a brony/furry convention or meet-up.
  6. If you would like to create a bot account, please contact a moderator. Also, these accounts are not allowed to interact with users unless directly mentioned.
  7. You may not use a disposable mail service to create an account.
  8. Anything that depicts nudity, pornography, or anything not suitable for minors must use a content warning label (CW). Sexual content depicting minors is forbidden.
  9. Impersonation is prohibited. Parody accounts must state that they are.
  10. If you post someone else's content (Such as fanart), please credit the original creator.
  11. Inciting danger is prohibited. This applies (but not limited) to finance and health, for example. Cryptocurrencies are included in this ban.
  12. Promoting organizations or ideologies that go against our rules is prohibited. For example, you can't promote a political party that incites hatred or harassment. In case it's not already clear: If you're far-right, you'll save time by registering elsewhere.
  13. Multi-accounts are allowed as long as they are not used to circumvent a sanction or a user block. When creating a new account, please enter the name of your main account (to help moderation).

Moderators are instructed to be tolerant and to give a second chance if the infraction is not serious. Also, it is important to maintain friendly relations between moderators and users, so don't hesitate to reach out if you feel there's a problem.

üôè Credits

The notification sound was created by OhPonyBoy.

üá´üá∑ Version fran√ßaise

üè° Introduction

EQS est une instance/serveur Mastodon pour les fans de petits poneys, qui est en ligne depuis le 8 mai 2017. Elle fait partie du fediverse, un grand r√©seau social d√©centralis√©.

‚ö†Ô∏è En raison de spams, les comptes sont approuv√©s manuellement. Merci d'√™tre clair dans votre message d'inscription, ou vous serez consid√©r√© comme un robot. Si vous n'avez pas re√ßu le courriel d'inscription, essayez de regarder dans le dossier des ind√©sirables, ou utilisez une autre adresse. En effet, certains fournisseurs de bo√Æte mail peuvent nous bloquer.

Si vous le souhaitez, vous pouvez aider financi√®rement l'instance sur Liberapay (C'est un peu comme Patreon ou Tipeee, mais en libre).

ü¶Ñ Nos copains (Qui parlent fran√ßais)
  • Radio Brony, une webradio
  • Canterlot Comics, une biblioth√®que de webcomics
  • Le Poney Blanc, un blog autour de cartoons dont MLP
  • New Lunar Republic, un site de streaming de la s√©rie MLP FiM
  • MLP France, un site de streaming de cartoons dont MLP
  • Need for Ponies, un autre site de streaming de cartoons dont MLP

üìë R√®gles du serveur

Les r√®gles sont n√©cessaires pour garantir une communaut√© saine. La r√®gle g√©n√©rale est de respecter les autres et d'utiliser son bon sens. En d'autres termes, ne soyez pas un c*n.

  1. Les contenus ill√©gaux au regard du droit fran√ßais et europ√©en (Y compris les liens hors site) ne sont pas autoris√©s. Vous √™tes l√©galement responsable du contenu que vous publiez.
  2. Les propos haineux ne sont pas autoris√©s. Cela inclut le racisme, la x√©nophobie, les LGBTphobies, la queerphobie, la grossophobie, etc...
  3. Soyez un poney ! Ne harcelez pas les autres, et n'y incitez pas.
  4. Pour que la timeline reste facile √† lire, ne postez pas de messages de spam ou de shitpost excessifs.
  5. Les comptes d'utilisateurs ne peuvent pas √™tre utilis√©s uniquement √† des fins publicitaires. Vous pouvez tout de m√™me vous inscrire en tant que convention ou meet-up brony/furry.
  6. Si vous souhaitez cr√©er un compte robot, veuillez contacter un¬∑e mod√©rateur¬∑ice. De plus, ces comptes ne sont pas autoris√©s √† interagir avec les utilisateurs, sauf s'ils sont directement mentionn√©s.
  7. Vous ne pouvez pas utiliser un service de courrier jetable pour cr√©er un compte.
  8. Tout ce qui montre de la nudit√©, de la pornographie ou tout ce qui ne convient pas aux mineurs doit porter un avertissement de contenu (CW). Les contenus √† caract√®re sexuel mettant en sc√®ne des mineurs sont interdits.
  9. L'usurpation d'identit√© est interdite. Les comptes parodiques doivent pr√©ciser qu'ils en sont.
  10. Si vous publiez le contenu de quelqu'un d'autre (Comme un fanart), merci de cr√©diter le cr√©ateur¬∑rice original.
  11. Inciter au danger est interdit. Cela concerne par exemple la finance et la sant√©. Les cryptomonnaies sont inclues dans cette interdiction.
  12. Promouvoir des organisations ou des id√©ologies qui vont √† l‚Äôencontre de nos r√®gles est interdit. Par exemple, vous ne pouvez pas promouvoir un parti politique qui incite √† la haine ou au harc√®lement. Dans le cas o√π ce ne serait pas d√©j√† assez clair : Si vous √™tes d'extr√™me droite, vous gagnerez du temps √† vous inscrire ailleurs.
  13. Le multi-compte est autoris√© tant qu'il ne sert pas √† contourner une sanction ou un blocage d'utilisateur. A la cr√©ation d'un nouveau compte, merci de renseigner le nom de votre compte principal (afin d'aider la mod√©ration).

Les mod√©rateurs ont pour ordre d'√™tre tol√©rant et de laisser une seconde chance si l'infraction n'est pas grave. De plus, il est important de maintenir des relations amicales entre les mod√©rateurs et les utilisateurs, alors n'h√©sitez pas √† nous contacter si vous pensez qu'il y a un probl√®me.

üôè Cr√©dits

Le son de notification a √©t√© cr√©√© par OhPonyBoy.

üåê Misc / Divers

üë• Moderation team / L'√©quipe de mod√©ration
  • @C_Chell
  • @fastfinge
  • @Deliambre
  • @Lunar
  • @cloudhop
  • @Shredd_Tone

üò∫ Custom emojis / Emojis personnalis√©s

  • HiccupsDoesArt :

  • Comeha & Midori-no-Ink (Derpibooru) :

  • PussPuss :

  • Wenni :

  • Miraculous Rubipphire :

  • Scraton :

  • Blobs :

Description:
We're a stable, long-running Mastodon instance for writers since 2017.

We're an inclusive community that welcomes all, as long as you're kind and respectful to others. We aim to provide an environment where you feel comfortable enough to participate freely and authentically. If you're not interested in that, there are plenty of other great instances to join.

What we're here for

We're here to discuss and find community around the act of writing. Want someone to critique your writing? Ask the community. Need a little encouragement? We're all supportive here. Swap reviews, share your struggles, set time aside to write together, or just send out small chunks of writing for the community to read.

Guidelines

In general, be good to each other. Enjoy talking to strangers (and friends!) on the internet, and give others the benefit of the doubt.

On commerce: if you are first and foremost engaged with the community, please feel free to also talk about your commercial work or projects. We only ask that you don't use our community as a free advertising channel. If you see any Writing Exchange accounts that seem to be pure spam, please report them.

On brands: on both the fediverse and Writing Exchange in particular, we're about people, not brands. If you represent a writing-related brand and want to create an account here, we again expect you to contribute to the community, and not simply advertise to everyone. Ideally, your brand account will be backed by a personal account, so we know who we're talking to and we can have more human conversations.

If problems arise, please use Mastodon's features to Block, Mute, or Report users that are causing problems. If you need more help, contact @matt.

Once you've joined

Introduce yourself! Communities like these work best when they're filled with strangers who talk to each other.

Then share yourself, your writing, and whatever feels right. We chose the name Writing Exchange because that's what we wanted to spark: an exchange. So don't be shy — trade words with people. Jump into conversations you wouldn't normally join. Share your processes and tools. Put your thoughts out to the community and see what can come from it.

Support

We are financially backed by community supporters and @matt's small company, Musing Studio / Write.as.

You can support this instance with a monthly or one-time donation on Open Collective.

More resources

  • Privacy Policy (for humans)
  • Writing Exchange Status
Short: A small, intentional community for poets, authors, and every kind of writer.

Description:
Be pervy, be kind.

A kink, gear, and BDSM-friendly Mastodon instance.

Sign Up

Approval is required for sign-up for anti-spam purposes. Please mention rubber or kink specifically so I can tell you're not a bot. Just a simple "I like rubber" works, even!

Donations

I am not accepting donations at this time. Doing so would have legal and tax ramifications that I'm not prepared for yet. Luckily server costs so far are just "beer money", so please enjoy!
Short: Be pervy, be kind. A kink, gear, and BDSM-friendly Mastodon instance.
rules:

We are a kink-positive and sex-positive community. Though it says rubber in the name, we welcome all types of risk aware consensual kink.'}, {'id': '8', 'text': 'No harassment or abuse.

Racism, misogyny, transphobia, homophobia, or body shaming will not be tolerated.'}, {'id': '9', 'text': 'Keep it legal

No child pornography. Users are assumed to be 18 years old or otherwise legal to view sexual content in their jurisdiction.'}, {'id': '10', 'text': 'Use Content Warnings or Sensitive Content flags.

Since we federate with other instances please mark any media with exposed genitals as Sensitive Content or with a Content Warning. No exposed genitals in your avatar or banner image please.'}, {'id': '11', 'text': "Use the #promo hashtag on ads or commercial posts.

We're excited for kink vendors to participate in our community. That said we'd like to keep it more of a flea market than a mall. Description:
General Information

  • photog.social is a separate and independent instance and is not affiliated with the Mastodon organization.
  • Announcements can be found by following @ambassador@photog.social on Mastodon.

Admin/Mod Team

  • @Ambassador: Primary admin/final word

Support/Donations

The photog.social instance is run by the admin team using their own funds.

If you're feeling like supporting the photog.social Mastodon instance monentarily, feel free to choose an option below.

We appreciate it and üíñ the support!

  • Patreon
  • Liberapay
  • PayPal.me

Approved Bots

  • @Announce: Announcements and other important info..
  • @dPS_Challenge: Bot that cross posts Digital Photography School (dPS) weekly challenges.

Unavailable Content and Instance Moderation

We have blocked a number of Japanese instances media due to some forms of loli content being legal in Japan but illegal elsewhere. Given our server is located outside of Japan we took a pro-active stance on blocking media as a "just in case" moment. This does not mean you cannot interact with these instances, simply their media will not be cached or shown on our instance.

Some instances we have chosen to remove from our federated timeline. You can still follow accounts on these instances and if you follow a user on one of the instances that does not appear on our federated timeline, their posts will show in your personal timeline. These are mainly instances that tend to be busy and/or are known for overloading our federated timeline with posts.

Some instances we have chosen to block outright. Most of these instances are full of illegal content, hate speech and more. We've also blocked instances that have run harassment campaigns against others in the past. You will NOT be able to interact with these instances from our instance.
Short:
A place for your photos and banter. Photog first is our motto

Please refer to the site rules before posting.
rules: [{'id': '2', 'text': '3-5 photo posts per day recommended to avoid overloading the timeline'}, {'id': '3', 'text': 'No illegal content (no porn, underage revealing, etc) Artistic portraits are fine. Admins decision is final.'}, {'id': '4', 'text': 'Keep it civil.  Best to avoid contentious political or religious debates. There are other instances for that.'}, {'id': '5', 'text': "Absolutely no anti-vaxx, conspiracy theory bullshit. This isn't the place for it. "}, {'id': '6', 'text': 'Images in your posts must be your own work. (ok to boost others though)'}, {'id': '7', 'text': "Generated AI* art is not permitted without being clearly labelled as such, AND being hidden behind a CW (Content Warning).\r\n\r\n* does not refer to AI tools used in processing, eg Topaz, DXO, Lightroom's denoise tools, etc."}]

Description:
A mastodon instance for hackers, tech anarchists, cyberpunks and anarchist hackers that follow the original hacker culture and The Hacker Ethics, ala Steven Levy. Newbees and people wanting to learn are welcome as long they share the hacker ethics of decentralization, horizontal societies, free and open source software read "The Hacker Ethics" by Steven Levy.

Whatch our Hacker show and documentaries
Short: Hispagatos - Anarcho hacker collective a(A)a - A Hacker culture and a Anarchist hacker friendly mastodon instance.

Description: „Åì„ÅÆ„Ç§„É≥„Çπ„Çø„É≥„Çπ„ÅØMasto.Host„Çí‰Ωø„Å£„Å¶„ÅÑ„Åæ„Åô„ÄÇ „Éû„Çπ„Éà„Éâ„É≥„ÅÆÁ∞°Âçò„Å™Ë™¨Êòé„Çí‰∏ãË®ò„Å´„Åæ„Å®„ÇÅ„Åæ„Åó„Åü„ÄÅ„ÅîÂèÇËÄÉ‰∏ã„Åï„ÅÑ„ÄÇ http://maonekoblog.blogspot.jp/p/blog-page.html This instance uses Masto.Host.

To keep this Project running and up-to-date you can support me on PayPal and Patreon.
There is also external Monitoring by Uptimerobot for this instance

Code of Conduct (TL;DR form)

The one big rule here is "Don't be a dick".

Some more specific rules here are:

  • Respect each other (really, EVERYONE)
  • follow Human Rights (pretty please?)
  • Tag your explicit content
  • Do not use explicit (NSFW, NSFL) avatars and profile headers
  • No commercial accounts (promoting your own work is absolutely ok)


Also some not so specific rules:

  • Please post NSFW content unlisted
  • If you crosspost regularly (or just RTs), please post as unlisted
  • Please don't leave you account alone while crossposting (it could be silcenced)

This list may be extended if needed, so don't push it. If you are deemed violating these rules (or their interpretations), you are subject to moderative actions like silencing or banning

Little addition for Bots

They should:

  • Be marked as such (Bot-Flag)
  • Please post as unlisted

Server is hosted in Germany by Hetzner. So please ... respekt the German laws.


PS: And yep, I mean the 8th ISO/OSI layer :P


Code of Conduct (long form)

Scope and Audience

This policy is for users who have their accounts on layer8.space.

Our instance is only available to users for personal use. Accounts with a commercial background should look elsewhere. Promoting your own work is okay, as long as it is not the focus of your account.



Intent and Remedies

Our guiding principle for remedies is that of intent and willingness to correct ones own behavior. It is okay if you fuck up. But we expect you to correct your behavior as soon as we point it out.

Please approach the moderation team with any issues or questions about this policy, or any other policy in this document. We're always happy to expand in the rationale of these policies and provide advice about being excellent to each other.

If you disagree and reject our requests to fix your behavior, maybe this isn't the right instance for you.



Banned Content

Content that is illegal in Germany is subject to suspensions.



Prohibited Content

We have a zero-tolerance policy against bigoted behavior. This especially includes, but is not limited to racism, sexism, xenophobia, antisemitism, islamophobia and transphobia.

This Instance is sometimes viewed in corporate environments, so all avatars and profile headers should be held in a SFW ("Safe for Work") manner.

Do not argue for the existence or relevance of reverse-racism or reverse-sexism. Racism and sexism are deep structural issues with culture and not the expression of single persons.



Crossposting

Crossposting from other social media accounts like your personal Twitter is considered no problem. But the posts which are visible in the instance timeline should be your own and not something like Retweets.

You also can crosspost retweets, but they should be posted as "unlisted". If you mostly post from twitter, then please also monitor you account over here to see reactions to your posts or other messages.

If we believe that your account is left alone and ist just filling the local timeline, you are subject to be silenced from the local timeline.



Content Warnings

We ask all users to make use of the Content Warning ("CW") feature in Mastodon extensively. While this is a hard requirement for any adult or disturbing content, particularly involving discussion about prohibited content, we highly encourage using it as a general disclaimer regarding the content of your toot.

If someone asks you to add a warning to a particular type of content, it is generally a good idea to follow through.



Personal Pronouns

We encourage you to add your pronouns to your profile if you want them to be used and also check your fellow users profiles for pronouns before engaging in conversation with them.



Discussions and Debate

If you want to start an argument, it is better to ask if the person you're engaging would be interested in hearing your take first. We're trying to build a space where conversations are held in a contructive manner. When you're asked to disengage, do so.



Credit

This (long-written) policies are modeled after deadinsi.de

Impressum

Layer8.Space
c/o COCENTER
Koppoldstr. 1
86551 Aichach

EMail: impressum@layer8.space
Short:
Welcome to the 8th Layer of Madness
Most topics are related to Linux, Anime, Music, Software and maaaany more

PS: BSD is also welcome üòú

Description:
We aim to provide a free and safe space for Pok√©fans of the federation, whether as a main general account to toot about anything, or for Pok√©mon-focused accounts to toot about anything related to the franchise.

The server‚Äôs registrations are currently set on manual approval, because the server is constantly targeted by advertisement robots. When submitting a registration application, please signal that you have read the server‚Äôs rules and that you intend to respect them. It‚Äôs also appreciated but not mandatory to link your existing fediverse or otherwise social media presence, if any.

If you want to help cover the financial costs of this server so we can keep this Pok√©mon community alive, you can send some Pok√©-dollars via Patreon!
If you prefer doing a one-time donation, you can do it with Ko-Fi.

Thanks to @codl, @setavulos and @hi_cial for the Donphan friend artworks!

Detailed rules

Here is a more specific and verbose version of the rules on the bottom of this page.

The following guidelines, as well as their simplified version, are not legal documents, and final interpretation is up to the administration of donphan.social, they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies.

  • Descriptive Content Warnings on any kind of sexual, violent or any other sensitive types of content are mandatory on public posts
  • Content Warnings on leaks, or rumors on the Pok√©mon franchise are mandatory, and strongly recommended on spoilers, or new official announcements about content for upcoming Pok√©mon media, or for any other franchise
  • It is highly recommended that you add a text descriptions to the images you post, to help make them accessible to people who use screen readers. To do so, hover on an image you just uploaded in the compose form, and you will have access to a field you can type into.
  • Fanart that are not made by the users posting them must be sourced to the original artist, or to where it was found if the original artist cannot be identified
  • CSAM or any kind of content sexualizing minors in any way shape or form is forbidden
  • Corporate advertising and brand accounts are forbidden, as well as accounts made solely to promote products or services with minimal connection to the server
  • Hate speech (including but not limited to, in no particular order: racism, ableism, misoginy, homophobia, biphobia, transphobia, antisemitism, islamophobia, classism, prejudice against sex workers), defense of hateful ideologies, harassment, dogwhistling (implicit but deliberate discrimination through coded language), reverse-ism and other generally malevolent types of behavior are forbidden
  • Anti-vaccination rhetoric, as well as other disproved conspiracy theories that do not fall into the hate speech rule but still pose a threat to public health and/or public safety are forbidden
  • Promotion of cryptocurrency or related projects including but not limited to web3, NFTs are forbidden

To make sure that this space remains safe and inclusive, we are blocking servers who either encourage hate speech, harassment, abuse and otherwise heinous behavior, or don‚Äôt moderate it strongly enough. Blocks won't be announced and blocked servers won't be notified of their block. The blocklist is accessible to registered users.

Friends

These servers and/or their administrators contributed directly or indirectly to donphan.social's life, and we would like to acknowledge and thank them. If you're looking for another server, we strongly recommend them!

  • pokemon.mastportal.info and @natsuki: the first Pok√©mon server on the fediverse. Donphan is their mascot too! Japanese-speaking server.
  • octodon.social and @CobaltVelvet: the generalist server where my first main account was located. Alice has always been providing me with valuable help and support when needed.
  • awoo.space and @noiob: a safe generalist server with strong moderation to minimize abuse. I am also a community mediator on this server.
  • glitch.social, dev.glitch.social: a generalist server, and the home of glitch-soc, the Mastodon fork with tons of good additional features on which donphan.social is running. Thanks as well to @Claire for her huge amount of work on glitch-soc and her invaluable support over the years.
  • chitter.xyz, @Violet, @codl and @bug: a friendly generalist server. codl also has an account here and they often post their Pok√©mon doodles!
  • @Dzuk: a good friend, and the creator of the Mutant Standard emojis that donphan.social and many other servers are using.
  • rage.love: A well moderated generalist server that hosts my (Siph) current main account.

@noiob has access to the server infrastructure. They are not going to be an admin or moderator here, but will be able to take over the server in case something happens that makes it so I cannot access it anymore. Please do not contact them unless it is absolutely certain that I won't have, or haven't had access to the server's infrastructure for a prolonged amount of time.

Credits

This server uses Mutant Standard Emoji, by dzuk and are licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 4.0
Pok√©mon icons Gen 1-7 from msikma‚Äôs pokesprite repository and Gen 8 from @EeveeEuphoria, modified by Siphonay
Pok√©mon icons from Pok√©mon Legends: Arceus and Gen 9 are taken from the National Pok√©dex Version Delta project, full credits available here
pokeball_think emoji by @Feufochmar
Gigantamax icon emoji by JorMxDos
Z-Moves icon emoji by ProfesseurVacoa
This server is not affiliated to Nintendo, Game Freak, The Pok√©mon Company or the Pok√©mon brand in any way. This server uses resources from Pok√©mon media or substantially derived from it that are possibly copyrighted and/or registered trademarks. The administration of the server claims this to be fair use, and no copyright infringement is intended.
Short: This generalist Mastodon server welcomes enthusiasts of the Pok√©mon franchise, to talk about it or anything else. Join the federation!

Description:
Code of conduct:

We are a community for fetish models, photographers, producers and fans.

We are part of the distributed social network Mastodon. It's like Twitter, except it exists as a federation of lots of little communities (called instances) which can talk to each other.

Importantly, these are run by lots of different people, under their own control.

There is no central company which can censor us.

This community is run by the webmaster of RestrainedElegance.com; other fetish producers, models and fans are very welcome to join us.

Fetish/Erotic/Adult performers, models, photographers, producers - posting samples and links to your commercial work here is allowed and encouraged!

Each instance has its own rules and guidelines. These are ours.

Describing your Content When You Post

Please mark "Not Safe For Work" (NSFW) content with the eye button for images AND the CW button for text. It is important to DO BOTH for every post so vanilla users on other instances know what they are getting.

Choose SFW images for avatars, as they show up on people's timelines in other instances regardless of the viewer's content settings.

In Settings->Preferences, you can set "Always mark media as sensitive". (You can also choose "Always show media marked as sensitive" too).

Use the CW text to describe the content- I use NSFW, nudity, bondage, BDSM for my posts.

That will make people click on your keywords like "NSFW, nudity, bondage, BDSM" to reveal the content (which is kinda cool, actually). You can flag CW's automatically if reposting your twitter feed. More detailed instructions here: HERE.

Describing our content is the Mastodon way of being polite and considerate to the neighbours, so they will have our feeds on their instances. This will mean we can reach scene newcomers and worried kinky people seeking out information, as well as existing fans.

General Rules

We are a small and friendly instance and I'd like to keep it that way. So please:

  1. No child porn, illegal activities, necrophilia, bestiality or age play (except with people who are CLEARLY adult). It's the law.
  2. Be kind to each other.
  3. Don't be an arse.
  4. No personal attacks or flame wars.
  5. Don't post stolen content or links to stolen content.
  6. That means no Tube sites, sorry. Not even if you actually own the content on them.
  7. Don't post illegal material, or links to illegal material.
  8. Don't flood the place with irrelevant spam adverts for tractors or coffee machines, but on-topic erotica/webcam/OnlyFans/website links are part of what we're here for.

The admin reserves the right to kick you off if you're not playing nice; you're a guest in our social media house and I'd really appreciate keeping it a friendly place to be.

Remember that Mastodon is a collective of small instances, so if these rules don't seem right to you, it is very easy to set up your own instance. Please come and link with us when you're set up!
Short: A kinky community for fetish models, photographers, producers and fans.

Description:
Tabletop Social

We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (& more). We welcome everyone that wants to be part of the community, boardgamers, RPG players, casual gamers, party gamers, hobbyists, LARPers, game designers and publishers, RPG characters, artists, writers, vlogers, podcasters, reviewers, streamers, lego builders and more.

This is meant to be a positive and safe space for people to enjoy each other's ideas, opinion and have fun. To keep tabletop.social that way, the Code of Conduct, Rules and Etiquette will be applied and enforced thoroughly, see below.

Rules and Etiquette

Welcome! Please feel free to join us here, but if you do know that we ask everyone to keep a few things in mind. The following list is not exhaustive, and will be modified and expanded over time. Look, if you get it and you you're good with it, great. If you don't get it, figure it out - we can help! If you don't want to get it, maybe find somewhere else to hang your hat.

Be you

This is a space to celebrate our diversity. Here you don't need to be a brand, be true to yourself and let others do the same.

Cultivate a Safe Atmosphere

Harassment will not be tolerated, oppressive behavior will not be tolerated, and while failure to recognize the boundaries of others may be met at first with a gentle attempt to educate you, repeated failure will not be tolerated.

Share Things

Talk about what you are up to! Talk to other people about what they are up to! Make things! Share you patreon! Post your art! Bots welcome (see below)!

Self Promotion

Have a have patreon, a gumroads, a kickstarter on the go? Is it your main source of income? We get it and encourage you to share these.

What we don't want the local timeline to be is an endless stream of self promotion. Please follow the guidelines.

On Marketing

We allow brands, we allow games accounts, but for its social function, not to exploit it for some other purpose. Company and game accounts are treated similarly to bots and you need to follow the guidelines.

Bots Guideline

Mastodon has different 'timelines' that different people can see - the Local Timeline is a timeline everyone in this community can see. You post to it by choosing 'Public' (the globe icon) in your post toolbar.

We really want our Local Timeline to be an antidote to traditional social media posting; a more down to earth place where people talk about themselves and what they're up to.

Follow the guidelines.

Banal Bullshit Unwelcome

There's nothing interesting about homophobia, transphobia, racism, ableism, sexism or any of the other unexamined default settings some people grow up with. Being a nazi isn't an opinion, it's shitty and aggressively boring - take it somewhere else. You can feel free to disagree somewhere else where none of us have to hear you. Enforced strictly.

Standing on the Shoulders of Giants

Rules, Etiquette, Bots, block list

We are very thankful to other community like weirder.earth and sleeping.town and the people running them.

They allow people to use their extensive rules, policies and hard gained knowledge about unsafe communities out there.

We mostly follow blockchain's blocklist.

Art

The lovely art that represent this instance was made by the ever so talented Dona!

Emojos

This community uses Mutant Standard emoji from Caius Nocture, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

Custom Theme

The fluffy friends (under the compose toot) and profile picture from @host@tabletop.social are from Famine and under the same license as Tootsuite/Mastodon: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

@host@tabletop.social Branding

See above for the avatar

The header is from darklavendrvoid

Favicon

Favicon is "Hexagon by RULI from the Noun Project".

Other Space

Tabletop.social is where we hope you'll enjoy spending time. We welcome main accounts and alternative accounts. If you only have one account on the fediverse, we highly suggest that you create a secondary account/alternative account somewhere else as a backup.

Here is a list of community that are relevant to the hobby

  • Ten Forward
  • The Wandering Shop
  • Dice Camp
  • Ludosphere
  • Rollenspiel Social
  • Warhammer Social
  • PeopleMaking.Games
  • Aux Portes de l'Imaginaire
  • Tabletop.VIP

Moderation

The current moderation is done by 4 (four) people. Allow 24 hours for answers, actions and replies .

To report a toot, click the "3" dots menu and click report. It will allow you to select one or more toot. You'll also be able to add a note for the moderators to see.

We are always looking for help to moderate this community, we would appreciate people from different background, life experience and geographies.

To do so and improve bias, we will favor people that are not cis, hetero, white, man, European. To apply send a DM to @host@tabletop.social, the process is not formalized and might take a while.

We have a page that gets a little more specific about this that you should take the time to read if you're thinking of joining. You can read it here .

Tabletop.social does not allow collection of its data using the API or through any other means for research, marketing, model building, search engine; unless opt-in has been specifically given by host@tabletop.social
Short: We are an inclusive Mastodon community for everything tabletop (and more).

Description:
hey hello!

welcome to the tildeverse, a digital community of linux servers for socializing, learning, and making cool stuff

this instance is hosted by tilde.team. stop by and sign up if you want to make some cool stuff with us :)

file uploads are limited to 200mb.

pinafore is available as an alternate client

please see the terms of service

have fun and be nice!

if you have a few spare bucks, you can send em over to @ben via liberapay, my fosspay, or directly to my stripe page. thanks!

server status page can be found here: status.tilde.zone. maintenance updates are usually posted on @ben's account.

there's a #tilde.zone channel on tilde.chat for chatter and outage checks. i'll post updates in the topic there.
Short: mastodon instance of the tildeverse, a collection of small public access *nix systems for collaboration, creativity, and socializing. a proud part of the small internet.

We will use translation tools if we need to.', 'hint': ''}, {'id': '12', 'text': 'tilde.zone is not intended for minors. At our discretion, and for the legal safety of our volunteer organization, accounts of minors in Florida and other oppressive US states will be removed', 'hint': ''}, {'id': '13', 'text': 'Actively using accounts on instances that we ban for violating our rules (ie., transphobia/fascism/etc.) is grounds for the termination of your tilde.zone account.', 'hint': ''}]

Sobre a inst√¢ncia

Colorid.es √© uma inst√¢ncia com foco queer/LGBTQIAPN+. Qualquer pessoa pode fazer uma conta aqui, mas n√£o se surpreenda ao encontrar poucas pessoas h√©tero, cis e perissexo. Levamos nossas regras a s√©rio; por favor, leia todas as nossas regras antes de fazer sua conta.

Colorid.es √© principalmente para pessoas que falam portugu√™s, mas pessoas que n√£o falam portugu√™s ou que v√£o postar em m√∫ltiplas l√≠nguas s√£o bem-vindas!

Inclu√≠mos pessoas queer, intersexo, transg√™nero, n√£o-bin√°rias, de orienta√ß√µes multi, heteroflex√≠veis, do espectro assexual, do espectro arrom√¢ntico, de atra√ß√£o fluida, xenog√™nero, polig√™nero, do espectro ag√™nero, que n√£o s√£o h√©tero por conta de sua orienta√ß√£o sensual/queerplat√¥nica/alternativa, astroidianas, asterianas, cujos g√™neros s√£o influenciados por culturas/cren√ßas/experi√™ncias de vida, entre outras, como parte da comunidade. Seu √≥dio por elas n√£o √© negoci√°vel independentemente de sua identidade, e resultar√° em banimento.

Se voc√™ quer uma introdu√ß√£o melhor √† inst√¢ncia e ao Hometown, confira sobre.colorid.es!


Nossas regras

0. A modera√ß√£o da inst√¢ncia possui o direito de deletar qualquer brilho/toot/tute (postagem) ou conta, ou de silenciar/bloquear qualquer inst√¢ncia, se percebermos que est√£o causando mais mal do que bem √† comunidade.

  • Isto se aplica principalmente a quando as regras abaixo s√£o quebradas, mas tamb√©m se aplica a casos n√£o previstos nelas.

1. Tudo o que for contra a lei brasileira √© proibido aqui.

2. Tudo o que for postado ser√° de responsabilidade de cada postadore. Detalhes:

  • Caso outra pessoa fa√ßa uma infra√ß√£o pela sua conta, √© voc√™ quem deve ser cuidadose da pr√≥xima vez.
  • Caso haja alguma infra√ß√£o legal, a responsabilidade n√£o √© da equipe do site.
  • Caso voc√™ fa√ßa algo contra as regras em outra conta desta inst√¢ncia, sua conta ainda pode ser punida.

3. Atitudes preconceituosas ou propositalmente irritantes n√£o ser√£o toleradas. Detalhes:

  • H√° um limite entre perpetuar algum preconceito por acidente por ser a atitude padr√£o da sociedade e entre insistir que tal atitude √© inofensiva/"senso comum".
  • H√° um limite entre fazer perguntas e insist√™ncia em n√£o entender porque algo √© nocivo a um certo grupo de pessoas.
  • H√° um limite entre fazer uma brincadeira sem saber que algu√©m se incomodaria e entre insistir na brincadeira porque √© s√≥ uma brincadeira.
  • H√° um limite entre querer se expressar e entre postar repetidamente mensagens curtas e/ou repetitivas e essencialmente sem conte√∫do novo. Se quiser ficar fazendo spam, use a op√ß√£o para postagens n√£o listadas, ou op√ß√µes de postagens privadas.
  • Mesmo que n√£o seja em rela√ß√£o a uma opress√£o/discrimina√ß√£o existente, aparente ou conhecida, tente n√£o julgar pessoas por comportamentos "estranhos", "rid√≠culos" ou "infantis" quando isso n√£o te afeta. Casos extremos disso podem levar a a√ß√µes da modera√ß√£o.
  • Tamb√©m evite fazer julgamentos superficiais sobre grupos que voc√™ n√£o conhece, especialmente em postagens p√∫blicas feitas de forma assertiva. Isso pode acabar sendo visto como discrimina√ß√£o, mesmo que o grupo n√£o sofra opress√£o sist√™mica.

4. Evite brigas. Detalhes:

  • Caso algu√©m esteja agindo mal, argumente sem depender de insultos vagos, bloqueie e/ou denuncie.
  • Mesmo que algum lugar tenha tomado decis√µes ruins em rela√ß√£o a uma pessoa ou grupo, aqui n√£o √© o lugar de organizar "invas√µes" contra outros espa√ßos.
  • Caso algu√©m exponha algum canal de comunica√ß√£o de uma pessoa problem√°tica, n√£o pense que √© uma boa ideia enviar mensagens com sugest√µes violentas para a pessoa. Caso seja descoberto que tais mensagens venham desta inst√¢ncia, √© poss√≠vel que a√ß√µes sejam tomadas contra isso na inst√¢ncia.
  • Evite fazer indiretas provocativas a pessoas ou grupos em postagens nas linhas do tempo p√∫blicas e/ou sem avisos de conte√∫do.

5. Utilize o aviso de conte√∫do quando necess√°rio. Conte√∫do que precisa de aviso inclui:

  • Pol√≠tica (no sentido de elei√ß√µes e de decis√µes governamentais)
  • Sangue/viol√™ncia
  • Conte√∫do sexual ou com conota√ß√£o sexual
  • Abuso, bullying, suic√≠dio, persegui√ß√£o, eugenismo e outras situa√ß√µes negativas que pessoas podem querer evitar ler/ver imagens sobre, especialmente por conta de experi√™ncias passadas com isso
  • Postagens sobre epidemias, pandemias e desastres naturais (ou eventos f√≠sicos perigosos n√£o naturais) atuais ou recentes
  • Discuss√µes ou men√ß√µes de incesto
  • Experi√™ncias negativas com discrimina√ß√£o (racismo, capacitismo, misoginia, diadismo, heterossexismo, cissexismo, exorsexismo, monossexismo, antissemitismo, xenomisia, de classe, contra profissionais do sexo, contra n√£o-monogamia, etc.)
  • √Ålcool/drogas
  • Spoilers de m√≠dia que foi lan√ßada nos √∫ltimos 7 dias:
    • Caso a m√≠dia em quest√£o seja jogo eletr√¥nico, filme, epis√≥dio de s√©rie, reality show, novela ou desenho, livro/texto/v√≠deo/√°udio de fic√ß√£o ou que contenha alguma hist√≥ria real que pode ser "estragada" caso contem o desenvolvimento ou o final: colocar aviso de conte√∫do de spoiler √© necess√°rio;
    • Caso a m√≠dia em quest√£o seja an√∫ncio, publica√ß√£o acad√™mica, programa/artigo jornal√≠stico, livro did√°tico, not√≠cia, ou texto, v√≠deo, imagem ou √°udio com fins informativos que n√£o tenha alguma hist√≥ria que possa ser "estragada" caso contem seu desenvolvimento ou o final: aviso de conte√∫do de spoiler n√£o √© necess√°rio, a n√£o ser que tal m√≠dia fa√ßa refer√™ncia a algo do item anterior;
    • Caso o conte√∫do se encaixe em ambos ou em nenhum dos itens acima, use o bom senso. Talvez seja bom deixar o conte√∫do dentro de aviso de conte√∫do, caso voc√™ n√£o tenha certeza.

N√£o √© necess√°rio utilizar avisos de conte√∫do para outros tipos de conte√∫dos ou assuntos, mas recomendamos que os utilizem sempre que perceber que outras pessoas possam n√£o querer engajar com o conte√∫do das suas postagens, ou querer conhecimento pr√©vio de seus conte√∫dos antes disso.

Para provar que voc√™ leu as regras, coloque a sequ√™ncia de s√≠mbolos $*@ em algum lugar de seu pedido de aprova√ß√£o de conta.

6. Caso voc√™ queira fazer uma conta completamente automatizada ("bot"), que seja apenas para an√∫ncios/propaganda, ou cujo conte√∫do principal pode estar "em cima da linha" do que √© permitido ou n√£o, por favor contate a administra√ß√£o com anteced√™ncia, para que possamos indicar o que voc√™ pode ou n√£o pode fazer.

7. N√£o roube conte√∫do, e respeite as vontades des artistas. Detalhes:

  • Caso algu√©m n√£o queira ter seu conte√∫do repostado, n√£o reposte-o.
  • A n√£o ser que o conte√∫do esteja explicitamente marcado como algo que √© permitido repostar sem cr√©dito (como conte√∫do de dom√≠nio p√∫blico), cada cita√ß√£o de livro/m√∫sica, v√≠deo, imagem (incluindo avatar/cabe√ßalho), arte ASCII, etc. precisa ter indica√ß√£o de cr√©dito, como um link para o perfil de artista, o nome de artista/do trabalho ou um link que credita e artista pelo trabalho postado, a n√£o ser que ele seja seu.
  • Caso algume artista pe√ßa para ter sua arte removida de suas postagens ou do seu perfil, voc√™ deve obedecer o pedido.

Especifica√ß√µes em rela√ß√£o a quest√µes envolvendo menores de 18 anos

Menores de 16 anos n√£o devem se registrar em colorid.es.

Os seguintes conte√∫dos (os quais j√° devem estar marcados com avisos de conte√∫do segundo a regra 5) n√£o podem receber intera√ß√µes de menores de 18 anos, com a exce√ß√£o de den√∫ncias caso quebrem alguma regra:

  • Postagens detalhando ou mostrando atos sexuais;
  • Postagens detalhando ou mostrando detalhes de taras e fetiches;
  • Postagens discutindo parafilias;
  • Postagens discutindo relacionamentos √≠ntimos fict√≠cios ou hist√≥ricos envolvendo adultes e menores de idade com mais de 3 anos de diferen√ßa entre a parte mais velha e mais nova, independentemente do teor da postagem ou da falta de conte√∫do expl√≠cito;
  • Postagens discutindo, detalhando ou mostrando atos de estupro, tortura ou outras formas de viol√™ncia pesada.
Al√©m disso:

  • Independentemente da idade de quem est√° por tr√°s da conta ou do aviso de conte√∫do na postagem, conte√∫do que erotiza menores de 18 anos n√£o pode ser postado nesta inst√¢ncia;
  • Mencionar contas de menores de idade em postagens inapropriadas ou mandar links de tais postagens para elus √© uma a√ß√£o proibida;
  • Se um conte√∫do estiver marcado como restrito a uma faixa et√°ria m√≠nima (ex.: 18+), seja uma conta que pede certa idade para acompanhar ou uma postagem com um aviso do tipo, isso deve ser respeitado;
  • Por conta da modera√ß√£o ser composta por maiores de 18 anos, nenhum conte√∫do em colorid.es pode ser completamente restrito a menores de idade. Caso algu√©m seja menor de idade e n√£o queira intera√ß√£o nenhuma com pessoas adultas, ter√° que ir para outro servidor.


A modera√ß√£o de colorid.es n√£o tem como monitorar que postagens s√£o lidas ou n√£o, mas queremos cultivar uma comunidade respons√°vel com o pr√≥prio consumo de conte√∫do. Por isso, esperamos que nosses usu√°ries adolescentes demonstrem a responsabilidade de respeitar os limites descritos aqui.



Inst√¢ncias com regras completamente diferentes das nossas podem ser bloqueadas. Por√©m, se as regras tiverem pequenas diverg√™ncias (como alguns dos itens sob a regra do que precisa de aviso de conte√∫do), as inst√¢ncias podem n√£o ser bloqueadas. @QueerNeko - op√ß√£o de privacidade n√£o listada + local, configura√ß√£o de visibilidade de formata√ß√£o de texto, limite de caracteres em nome/bio/toots, tamanho personalizado de emojis

Como selecionar imagens sem descri√ß√£o para diferenciar sua apar√™ncia

Utilizamos Jortage para nossa hospedagem de m√≠dia.



About this instance

Colorid.es (from colorides, "colorful people") is an instance focused on the queer/LGBTQIAPN+ community. Anyone can make an account, but don't be surprised if you encounter few het, cis and perisex people here. We take our rules serioulsy, so please read that section before making an account.

Also, this is an instance primarily for Portuguese speakers. People who don't speak Portuguese or who will also speak in other languages are welcome, though, as long as our moderation team can handle it!

We include people who are queer, intersex, transgender, nonbinary, multi-oriented (m-spec), heteroflexible, asexual spectrum, aromantic spectrum, fluid, xenogender, polygender, agender spectrum, non-het regarding sensual/alterous/queerplatonic orientation, astroidian, asterian, non-cis because of culture/belief/life experience, and others in the community. Your hatred for them is not tolerable regardless of your own identity, and will result on a ban.

This instance's moderation team has the right of deleting any toot (post) or account, if we notice it's causing the community more harm than good. See the rules to know more.

If you don't think this instance is for you, take a look at this list or this one to find other good servers.


About Mastodon

Don't know what Mastodon or the Fediverse are? Check out these guides:
  • What Is Mastodon? (And Why You, A Leftist, Should Be On It)
  • Toot How-To: Intro to Mastodon
  • Federated Sites
  • Mastodon 101: A Queer-Friendly Social Network You‚Äôre Gonna Like a Lot
  • Mastodon instances, and the ones I recommend
  • delve‚Äôs Mastodon Resource List



Our rules

0. This instance's moderation/administration staff reserves the right to delete any toot (post) or account, and the right to block/silence any instance, if we decide those are doing more harm than good to the community.

  • This usually applies to posts/users/instances that break the following rules, but may also apply to cases which are unaccounted for.

1. Anything against Brazilian law is not allowed here.

2. Everything posted by you is your responsibility.

  • If someone else goes against the rules on your account, you are the one who should be more careful next time.
  • If you post anything that's against the law, this is not the responsibility of colorid.es' staff.
  • If you do anything against the rules of this instance on another account, your account may still be punished.

3. Bigoted and/or annoying attitudes won't be tolerated.

  • There is a limit between contributing to oppression on accident because of society's default views and insisting on contributing to oppression because you think certain opinions are "not a big deal" or "common sense".
  • There is a limit between asking questions and insisting on not understanding why something is bad to a certain group of people.
  • There is a limit between joking around without knowing someone could get offended and insisting on "joking around" because "it's not serious".
  • There is a limit between wanting to express oneself and posting many repetitive and/or short messages with essentially no new content. If you want to spam, use the private or unlisted options.
  • Even if it doesn't have to do with known kinds of discrimination/oppression, try not to judge people for "strange", "ridiculous" ou "childish" behavior when it doesn't affect you. Extreme cases of this may lead to moderation action.
  • Also avoid making superficial judgements about groups you barely know about, particularly in assertive Public posts. They may end up counting as discrimination, even if the groups in question aren't systemically oppressed.

4. Avoid fights.

  • If someone is acting in bad faith, argue without resorting to vague/baseless insults, block the person and/or report them.
  • Even if somewhere else someone made bad decisions regarding a person or group, here is not the place to plan "raids" against other spaces.
  • If someone exposes a way to communicate with someone that did something problematic, don't think it's a good idea to send messages with violent suggestions to them. If such messages come from this instance, we may take action against this on here.
  • Please avoid negatively subposting without content warnings and/or in Public posts about people or groups that could see your post.

5. Use content warnings when necessary. Content that needs labeling includes:

  • Politics (as in elections and government decisions)
  • Blood/gore/violence
  • Sexual content or content with sexual connotations
  • Abuse, bullying, suicide, stalking, eugenicism and other negative situations people may want to avoid reading or seeing images about, especially because of their own past experiences
  • Discussions or warnings about epidemics, pandemics and natural disasters (or other similar dangerous events such as fires) that are ongoing or in recent memory
  • Discussion or mentions of incest
  • Negative experiences regarding discrimination (racism, ableism, misogyny, dyadism, heterosexism, cissexism, exorsexism, monossexism, antisemitism, xenomisia, classism, whoremisia, against non-monogamous people, etc.)
  • Alcohol/drugs
  • Spoilers regarding media that has been out for less than 7 days:
    • If such media is a videogame, a movie, an episode of a reality show/cartoon/series, a book/text/video/audio which contains a fictional or real story that may be "spoiled" if someone tells its development or ending: content warnings for spoilers are mandatory;
    • If such media is an ad, an academic publication, a journalistic article/show, or a video/text/audio/image that's meant to be informative and that doesn't contain any story that may be "spoiled" if its development or ending is told: content warnings for spoilers aren't needed, unless such media spoils something that applies to the item above;
    • If such media doesn't fit either or fits both of the descriptions above, use common sense. And if you still aren't sure, maybe put the content inside a spoiler content warning anyways.

It's not mandatory to use content warnings for other kinds of contents or subjects, but we recommend using them as much as you think it's worth it. See what other people content warn, for instance.

To prove you've read the rules, put $*@ somewhere in your account approval request.

6. If you want to make an account with the purpose of posting automated content ("bot"), advertising or other kinds of "borderline against the rules" content, please contact the staff beforehand, so we can tell you how you can proceed.



7. Don't steal content, and respect artists'/creators' wishes. Details:

  • If someone doesn't want their content to be reposted, don't repost it.
  • Unless the content is explicitly marked as something that doesn't need attribution (such as public domain content), every book/song citation, video, image (including avatar/header), ASCII art, etc. needs to be credited, either by a link to the artist's profile, a link to somewhere that properly attributes the content or by citing an artist's name and/or the work's name, unless the work is your own.
  • If an artist asks you to remove their art from your profile or avatar, you'll have to remove it.

Regarding interactions with/from users below 18 years of age

Those below 16 years of age should not make accounts at colorid.es.

The following content (which should already be properly labeled and warned/filtered according to rule 5) must not be interacted with by users below 18 years of age:

  • Posts detailing or showing sexual acts;
  • Posts detailing or showing kinky/fetishistic acts;
  • Posts discussing paraphilias;
  • Posts discussing intimate relationships between adults and non-adults involving fictional or historical parties where the age gap is over 3 years between the oldest and the youngest party, regardless of the post being about explicit content or not;
  • Posts discussing, detailing or showing acts of rape, torture or other kinds of heavily violent acts.
Furthermore:

  • No matter the age of whoever is behind the account or whether the content is properly warned for or not, erotic content involving anyone below 18 is not allowed on this instance;
  • Mentioning accounts of users below 18 in inappropriate posts or sending links to such posts is not allowed;
  • If content is marked as restricted to a certain age (such as 18+), regardless if it's a content warning on a post or an account, this boundary must be respected;
  • Since our moderation team doesn't have anyone under 18 years of age, no content in colorid.es can be completely restricted to minors. If someone is a minor and doesn't want interactions from any adult at all, we recommend not making an account on this server.

Our moderation team can't track which posts are or aren't read, but we want to have a community that's responsible about one's own consumption of content. Because of this, we hope our teenage users demonstrate maturity and responsibility by respecting the boundaries established here.



Instances with completely different rules than ours may be blocked. However, slight rule differences (with regards to content warnings for certain things, for instance) may be tolerated. Be careful while navigating the global timeline.


Our staff

  • @QueerNeko (admin)
  • @Aster (admin)
  • @shadow (mod)

Financial information

This is how much colorid.es costs to maintain at the moment:

  • US$ 10,99/year for the .es domain;
  • US$ 63,60/month for the server;
  • A US$ 4,50/month donation for Jortage (where our media is).

It's possible to help us maintain the instance by donating at:

  • Benfeitoria (monthly donations only)
  • Ko-fi
  • Pix key (Brazil only): 0df54758-3aa5-4def-8194-5a900c99d1c7

Tips

  • Hints & Tips for getting started on alternative social media
  • Make sure you have a pronoun set on your bio and/or introduction post!
  • Make sure you pin your introduction post, so people may know you better before they decide if they want to follow you or not!
  • Check out emojos.in to see a list of our custom emojis!

Description:
Update December 14th 2022: Registration is closed after reaching our maximum user count.

What is Sunbeam City?

Sunbeam City (or SBC for short) is a young cooperative of individuals whose mission is to promote what we believe to be the values of the solarpunk movement. Part of what we do includes running services that are open to everyone, away from the control of profit-seeking, centralized corporations. We lead by example through using democratic decision-making and sharing resources to run these services.

Our current admins are:

  • Wakest
  • squeaky pancakes

Our current mods are:

  • Kevlar

Our current wiki maintainers are:

  • squeaky pancakes

Our Tech team is:

  • Username
  • squeaky pancakes
  • Kawaiipunk

What are these services?

We currently run:
  • A wiki that serves as a solarpunk knowledge bank
  • This Mastodon instance!

How do I join SBC?

Ask for an invite!

Sunbeam City is ran by a cooperative. If you would like to join in the decision-making process, you can sign up for membership by paying a contribution, which helps cover costs of the cooperative's activities. Members of the cooperative use OpenCollective to raise funds.

If you're curious, we have information about the cooperative and how to sign up on our wiki. If you'd like any help, just join our chatroom or contact the instance admin by DM or email (see top-right)
Short: Sunbeam City is a anticapitalist, antifascist solarpunk instance that is run collectively.

Description:
Instance rules

Adapted from the mastodon.social Code of Conduct

Please note that the rules below should not be considered a legal document and may be interpreted by the moderation team of tooting.ch as they see fit. This is only an overview which provides you with the general moderation policies you'll have to expect when using this instance.

Offenses against the rules can generally be categorized as one of the following:

  • Minor offenses
  • Moderate offenses
  • Major offenses

Minor offenses

Minor offenses will be handled by removing the content in question, hiding sensitive content behind a content warning or issuing a warning to the offending user. The risk of facing consequences like account suspension after one minor offense is very low.

The following list is an (incomplete) list of actions that count as a minor offense:

  • Nudity, pornography or other explicit material without content warning ( or CW) and appropriate description
  • Gore or extreme violence without content warning and appropriate description
  • Excessive advertising, be it manual or automated
  • Uncurated cross-posting from third-party sources such as news sites

Moderate offenses

Content that counts as moderate offense will lead to removal of the offending content. Additionally, depending on the circumstances, further actions that range from a warning to account suspension are likely to be taken.

  • Racism or advocation of racism
  • Sexism or advocation of sexism
  • Discrimination against minorities of any kind or advocation thereof
  • Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism or advocation thereof
  • Stalking or harassing other users or encouraging others to do so
  • Doxing, that is, aggregating, posting or spreading a user's private data, or encouraging others to do so, without their express permission
  • Brigading or dogpiling, that is, continuously engaging another user in conversation or discussion after said user has asked for this engagement to stop

Major offenses

If content is classified as a major offense, it is removed and leads to an immediate suspension of the offending account. Furthermore, the account holder will be reported to the authorities if appropriate and applicable.

  • Explicit depictions of children
  • Content illegal in Switzerland, such as hate speech
  • Promotion of the ideology of national socialism
  • Impeding other users' access to or degrading the performance of this instance or the attempt thereof

Règles d'instance

Adapté du code de conduite de mastodon.social

Veuillez noter que les règles ci-dessous ne doivent pas être considérées comme étant légales et peuvent être interprété par l'équipe de modération de tooting.ch comme ils l'entendent. Ceci n'est qu'une vue d'ensemble qui vous fournit les politiques générales de modération auxquelles vous devrez vous attendre lors de l'utilisation de cette instance.

Les infractions aux règles peuvent généralement être classées dans l'une des catégories suivantes:

  • Infractions mineures
  • Infractions modérés
  • Infractions majeures

Infractions mineures

Les infractions mineures seront traitées en supprimant le contenu en question, cacher un contenu sensible derrière une mise en garde sur le contenu ou l'émission d'un avertissement à l'utilisateur fautif. Le risque de faire face à des conséquences telles que la suspension du compte après une infraction mineure est très faible.

La liste suivante est une liste (incomplète) d'actions qui comptent comme un délit mineur:

  • Nudité, pornographie ou autre matériel explicite sans avertissement de contenu ( ou CW) et description appropriée
  • Sang ou extrême violence sans avertissement de contenu et description appropriée
  • Publicité excessive, qu'elle soit manuelle ou automatisée
  • Poster tout et n'importe quoi de sources tierces telles que de sites d'actualités

Infractions Modérée

Le contenu qui est considéré comme une infraction modérée entraînera la suppression de l'élément offensant. De plus, selon les circonstances, d'autres mesures allant d'un avertissement à la suspension du compte sont susceptibles d'être prises.

  • Racisme ou plaidoyer pour le racisme
  • Sexisme ou plaidoyer pour le sexisme
  • Discrimination à l'encontre des minorités de toute nature ou plaidoyer en faveur d'une telle mesure
  • nationalisme xénophobe et/ou violent ou plaidoyer de celui-ci
  • Parler ou harceler d'autres utilisateurs ou encourager d'autres utilisateurs à le faire
  • Doxing, c'est-à-dire agréger, afficher ou diffuser les données privées d'un utilisateur, ou encourager d'autres personnes à le faire, sans leur permission expresse
  • Brigading ou dogpiling, c'est-à-dire, engager continuellement un autre utilisateur dans une conversation ou une discussion après que ledit utilisateur a demandé que cet engagement s'arrête

Infractions majeures

Si le contenu est classé comme une infraction majeure, il est supprimé et entraîne la suspension immédiate du compte fautif. En outre, le titulaire du compte sera signalé aux autorités, s'il y a lieu.

  • Des représentations explicites d'enfants
  • Contenu illégal en Suisse , tel que les discours de haine
  • Promotion de l'idéologie du national-socialisme
  • Limiter l'accès d'autres utilisateurs dégrader les performances de cette instance
Short:

Description:
Instance donations accepted at: https://www.patreon.com/yifflife Personal donations accepted at: https://ko-fi.com/sky69

Running Glitch-Soc! Fork available at https://github.com/YiffLife/glitch-soc

Our legal jurisdiction is the United States. This instance is a non-commercial venture with no advertising.

Artists featured include Spoonycatt and NLdraws!

This server uses Mutant Standard emoji made by Dzuk, which are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

SYSTEM INFO

Running on a 16GB / 4 vCPU / 160GB Hetzner dedicated cloud VM.

Daily backup to Backblaze B2 bucket via restic.

Daily image backup via Hetzner. CDN hosting on DigitalOcean Spaces.* changing soon

Our instance rules can be located under "Server Rules" in a dropdown at the bottom of this page.

Additionally, please review our Extended Code of Conduct and Terms of Service for more information.

Blocked/Silenced Instances

The following instances are blocked for the reasons stated below. Please contact the administration if you have any questions or concerns.
Short: Yiff.Life is oriented towards those in the furry and LGBTQA+ communities.
topic: Yiff.Life - It's not what you think...

Description:
Report Handling

Below are rough definitions as to how moderaters will handle reports and what actions will be taken when a user report is submitted. Of course every report will be investigated thoroughly and punishments may be more or less severe based on moderator findings.

User level:

User Silence:
Minor infractions, heated arguments, frivolous accusations, and centrist rhetoric will result in the user being silenced. Users may still follow and converse with users that are silenced but their toots will not be federated.
User Suspension:
Major infractions, multiple and consistent infractions, abuse, hate speech, illegal content, and right wing politics will result in a full suspension. Users will be unable to interact with suspended accounts and, if the account is based on the instance, the user will not be able to log in or post.


Instance level:

Reject Media:
Applied to any server that allows illegal content and illicit porn. Can be applied to a server regardless of federated, silenced, or suspended status.
Domain Silence:
Reserved for instances whose politics are in violation of guideline 3. Currently consists mostly of Libertarian instances and gnu.social instances that have federated.
Domain Suspension:
Any domain that harbours hate speech, encourages the sharing of illegal content, or where admins have been unwilling to punish users violating guidelines 1 and 2 will be given a full suspension and will no longer be able to federate with our instance.
Short: Gc.c is an instance by trans women for trans folk and strives to keep the security and enjoyment of our users in mind.

This includes but is not limited to racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, classism, ableism, etc. Please report any hate speech encountered.'}, {'id': '3', 'text': 'Centrist and right-wing politics are not allowed. The politics of hate (and tolerance of hate) have no place on this instance and any discussion of these policies framed in a positive light will result in the user being silenced.'}, {'id': '4', 'text': 'Do not misuse the report system. Only report dangerous content pertaining to the rules above; do not create frivolous reports for disagreements over discourse or leftist politics.'}, {'id': '5', 'text': 'Posts containing NSFW content or content that users may not wish to engage with must be tagged with the content warning feature.'}]
