Description:
• New signups from the following email domains have been disabled: gmail.com, outlook.com, hotmail.com

Thank you to our friend phicyclist for your Gold tier support!!!

Code of Conduct

Liberdon's community adopts a "good neighbor" policy, as one of our goals is outreach to the other communities. As such, "ostracizable" (non-tolerated) behavior includes spamming, scamming, nudity* / pornographic / sexual / graphic / NSFW content, advocacy of the initiation of violence, ethnic/racial/homophobic slurs, harassment, or other content/activity that could get this site shut down by state agents with guns. Offending content will need to be removed by the user, and repeat offenders will be banned from the community.

We strive to be "work-friendly", so if you post anything that's allowable under our policy but may reasonably be considered objectionable, please use a CW (content warning) to tag it as such.

Note: If your account is primarily going to use aggregated/auto-posts, please enable the "This is a bot account" option in your profile, and ensure your bot isn't posting so often that it's overwhelming the local timeline (up to a few posts per hour on average is a good rule of thumb).

Moderation activities will be as transparent as possible, with rationales for each action. The community will have the opportunity to review and give input on actions, and the moderation team will be responsive to that.

Basically, just try to be a reasonable, productive member of Liberdon :)

* Nudity exceptions - the following are okay: Nudity in photos of paintings and sculptures; Breastfeeding (with content warning); Nudity in photos of political expression or significance (with content warning). Examples that don't qualify as exceptions: Nudity in digital art; Nudity with political text simply added to it; etc. Another good rule of thumb is "use common sense" ;)


FAQ

How to donate

Liberdon is kept running solely on your donations, as we don't advertise or sell your data. Your contributions are greatly appreciated! You can donate directly via:
  • Liberdon @ Patreon
  • Ethereum (ETH/ERC20): 0x1230a32f2F130aa0CF2409441294C33287F5149f
  • Monero (XMR): 42hsh4rN1ZD99SkEQEA1mB5BRazc79yL38pBMMpqgLpsUaDyjZFuwzEHLAz2gvQ7rYMsNeQUReByUPcjQcuRc7DPK7keMuS

Note: Want another option? Let us know!

How to invite people to follow you

Go to Invites. Check Invite to follow your account, and generate a link. People who sign up through the invite will automatically follow you!

How to enable/disable email notifications

Go to Notifications

Recommended: Enable all notifications to start with; then, if there are any you find you don't like, disable them.

How to find other Liberdon users to follow

Go to @Ambassador's follows. Ambassador auto-follows all new Liberdon users so we can easily find each other.

Does this instance block any other instances?

Not as of this writing, but if it happens in the future, in the interest of transparency it will be posted on @liberdon's profile, as will other admin news.

How to export all your data

Go to Data export

How to move from/to another Mastodon instance

  1. Export your data (see above)
  2. Import your data file via Data import

How to auto-post to Liberdon from Twitter (or any service on IFTTT)

A) Easy way (Twitter/Instagram only): Moa

B) Advanced way via IFTTT:

  1. In Liberdon, go to New Application
  2. Enter:
    • Name: Liberdontist
    • Website: https://liberdon.com
    • Scopes: read + write should be checked. Submit.
  3. Open the new app you created and select the access token.
  4. Create (and login to) an IFTTT account
  5. In IFTTT, go to maker_webhooks settings. Make sure it‚Äôs active.
  6. Create a new app for your desired service. For example, the "if this" could be Twitter > New tweet by you.
  7. For the "then that" section, choose a Webhooks action.
    • FOR TEXT + IMAGE POSTS, enter:
      1. URL: https://liberdon-bot.glitch.me/status_media
      2. Method: POST
      3. Content Type: application/json
      4. Body: { "access_token": "YOUR_LIBERDON_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN", "status": "<<<{{THE_TEXT_INGREDIENT}}>>>", "image_url": "{{THE_IMAGEURL_INGREDIENT}}" }
      5. NOTE: for Body, replace {{THE_TEXT_INGREDIENT}} & {{THE_IMAGEURL_INGREDIENT}} with your text/image ingredients; for example, from RSS this might be {{EntryContent}} & {{EntryImageUrl}}
      6. NOTE: this is an experimental service!
    • FOR TEXT-ONLY POSTS, enter:
      1. URL: https://liberdon.com/api/v1/statuses?access_token=YOUR_LIBERDON_APP_ACCESS_TOKEN
      2. Method: POST
      3. Content Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
      4. Body: status=<<<{{THE_TEXT_INGREDIENT}}>>>
      5. NOTE: for Body, replace {{THE_TEXT_INGREDIENT}} with your text ingredient if different; for example, from Twitter this might be {{Text}}
  9. Save, and add a title like If new tweet, post to Liberdon
  10. Try it!

Note: If your account is primarily going to be auto-posts, please enable the "This is a bot account" option in your profile.

What is 'bird site'?

It's a legacy social media site also known as 'Twitter'.
Short: Liberdon is an instance for libertarians, ancaps, anarchists, voluntaryists, agorists, etc to sound off without fear of reprisal. It was created in the wake of the Great Twitter Cullings of 2018.

Description:
Welcome

Welcome to the PHP community on Mastodon! We provide a place for PHP programmers & friends to discuss topics related to the PHP programming language, frameworks, packages, tools, open source, tech, life, and more. First and foremost, we're about building community, and that doesn't always involve technical discussion, so feel free to go off-topic and have fun.

Who's Behind This?

phpc.social is a PHP Commmunity Foundation project. PHP Community Foundation created phpc.social for the public benefit of the PHP community.

How Can I Help?

Thank you for your willingness to help! We appreciate it. Here are some areas we could use your help:

  • Contribute financially by donating through the phpc.social Open Collective project.
  • Volunteer as a moderator‚Äîget to know our community first! A moderator is a position of trust, so we need to know you're legit and planning to stick around.
  • Server administration‚Äîwe manage our own infrastructure, and we‚Äôd love to have your help. Just like being a moderator is a position of trust, so is working on our infrastructure. Hang out, take part in the community, and build trust before asking for access to the servers.

Code of Conduct

If you believe anyone is in physical danger or doing something that is against the law, please notify appropriate emergency services first by calling the relevant local authorities.

The instance is primarily meant for the PHP community and surrounding tech, but posts are not required to be on-topic. As long as it doesn't break the rules, feel free to talk about whatever you want.

Please remember that being on this server is a privilege, and not a right.

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of phpc.social; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies.

These policies apply to: posts, profile information and bio, as well as account handles, on phpc.social.

This is a living document, and updates to it will be made if necessary.

  1. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension upon repeated violations:
    1. Advertising of off-topic material for the PHP instance.
    2. Advertising more than once per hour of on-topic material without appropriate Content Warning.
    3. More than one automated post per hour or four per day, excluding posts with a visibility of "unlisted" or "followers only".
    4. Accounts that are primarily intended to post automated messages, unless they are marked "This is a bot account" in account settings and all posts have a visibility of "unlisted" or "followers only."
    5. Persistent trolling, and posts to test the limits of moderation
    6. Promotion of scams (including cryptocurrency and NFTs) or known misinformation/disinformation campaigns, such as anti-vaccination or climate denial.
  2. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and will result in a temporary account suspension, and revocation of access to the service
    1. Nudity, pornography, and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions, without an appropriate Content Warning
    2. Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions, without an appropriate Content Warning
  3. The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service:
    1. Racism or advocation of racism
    2. Sexism or advocation of sexism
    3. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism
    4. Incitement of violence against individuals or groups
  4. The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in immediate and permanent revocation of access to the service:
    1. Sexual depictions of children
    2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism
    3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  5. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilising the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviours:
    1. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed
    2. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox)
    3. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling)

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Moderation Procedures

Cross-Instance Moderation

First, a few notes on how cross-instance moderation works:

  1. If a remote user is reported from our instance, the report is immediately forwarded to the home of the remote user.
  2. Suspension of a remote user only makes them invisible from, and unable to react to, users on our instance.
  3. Any moderation actions we take with regard to a remote user are not relayed back to that user‚Äôs home instance.
  4. Our view of remote users does not include any information (email, IP address, etc.) that would allow us to proactively block that user from interacting with our instance outside the context of the account they‚Äôre currently on.

With that said, if user A on our instance reports user B on another instance for harassment/hate speech or similar-tier offences, moderators can and should take proactive action comparable to if the harassment had been directed at a user on our instance, even if the reported user has had no interactions with our instance (including follows in either direction). So if the remote user‚Äôs feed is exclusively hate speech, suspend that user.

Proactive vs. Reactive Moderation

Moderators are not obligated, as part of their role, to actively seek out accounts or posts that break our rules or would result in a report. Moderators, like any user of our instance, can use reporting functionality for bad actors that they see during their own use of the platform, and can even take moderation actions directly without going through the report system if they see something sufficiently egregious, though in those cases moderators should post in Discord with what they've done as an audit trail on top of the one built into Mastodon.

With that said, moderators‚Äô primary duty is to assist in resolving reports made by other users in a timely and consistent manner. This means that the role of a moderator is primarily reactive rather than proactive, and we‚Äôre knowingly making the tradeoff of catching things quickly to balance workload on a fully-volunteer moderation staff.

Best Practices

This section contains a set of guidelines on how to best use this instance. They include suggestions for when to use Content Warnings. (Mostly copied from https://blog.chaos.social/rules):

We ask users on phpc.social to keep the following guidelines in mind, in order to foster a considerate and accessible atmosphere. Forgetting about them is not as serious as breaking the instance rules, but repeated malicious unwillingness to follow the best practices will be considered just like breaking a rule.

  • Use content warnings liberally, especially for topics that are potentially disturbing or controversial, or that make life harder for people struggling with addiction or trauma, but also for spoilers.
  • Set the right language for your posts. By default Mastodon will use the interface language to attach to your posts, but if you (for example) have set that to English, and you post in German, then the posts will have "English" attached to them, and translations don‚Äôt work.
  • Add descriptions to images and videos.
  • Provide credit for creative works that are not your own.
  • Don't be a reply guy ‚Äì uninvited comments about another user‚Äôs personal choices, lifestyle, or family are strongly discouraged and may be considered harassment.
  • In discussions, please remain civil, do not insult the people you‚Äôre talking to. Don‚Äôt escalate.

Reporting Harassment

To report harassment, click the three vertical dots (‚ãÆ) on a user's profile and select "Report @user." For urgent concerns, you may contact us at hello@phpcommunity.org.

Policies

Your continued used of phpc.social implies your agreement to our policies. If you disagree with our policies, please discontinue use of our services.

We fully subscribe to and comply with the Mastodon Server Covenant. A number of instance blocks are implemented to comply with the principles of the covenant and to prevent our users from being exposed to content that does not comply with our instance rules.
Short: A server for PHP programmers & friends. Join us for discussions on the PHP programming language, frameworks, packages, tools, open source, tech, life, and more.

F√ºr alle, die gerne √ºber Bildung unter den Bedingungen der digitalen Transformation diskutieren oder gemeinsam Projekte entwickeln wollen. Administriert von fries, ebinger und favstarmafia. Gehostet von masto.host.

Wir haben folgende (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

  1. Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
  2. Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
  3. Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten
  4. Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
  5. Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen
  6. Nicht markierter sexueller Inhalt, Gewaltdarstellungen oder Werbung
  7. Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
  8. Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein.

√úbernommen von social.saarland

Jeder Nutzerin und jedem Nutzer steht maximal ein Konto zu. Mehrfachanmeldungen sind nur mit schriftlicher Zustimmung von uns gestattet. (Bspw. zur Erstellung eines Projektkontos, oder zum Betreiben von Bots oder Zweitkonten).

Konten f√ºr kommerzielle Zwecke erfordern eine schriftliche Erlaubnis unsererseits.

Cross-Posting von Twitter ist hier nicht erw√ºnscht und kann deshalb von uns in der lokalen TL unterdr√ºckt werden.

Wir behalten uns vor, Konten, die √ºber 365 Tage keine Anmeldeaktivit√§t aufweisen zu l√∂schen. Hierzu erh√§lt jeder Account per Mail eine Einspruchsfrist von 30 Tagen. Nach diesen 30 Tagen wird der Account unwiderruflich gel√∂scht und kann dann nicht mehr reaktiviert werden. F√ºr einmal gel√∂schte Konten, kann weder der verwendete Account-Name, noch die zugeh√∂rige Mailadresse auf dieser Instanz wieder verwendet werden

Konten, die nicht per Mail best√§tigt werden, werden von uns gel√∂scht.

Wir behalten uns vor, der Nutzerin oder dem Nutzer die Lizenz zur Nutzung des Dienstes zeitweise oder dauerhaft, jederzeit und ohne Angaben von Gr√ºnden zu entziehen. Ausgenommen davon sind gesetzliche Verpflichtungen und Bestimmungen.

Funding

Falls ihr f√ºr dieser Instanz etwas spenden wollte, dann k√∂nnt ihr das hier machen

patreon

Eine √úbersicht √ºber Kosten und Gegenfinanzierung sowie weitere datenschutzfreundliche Zahlungswege findet ihr hier

Gesperrte Mailanbieter

Aktuell kann man sich mit den Mailanbietern outlook.com, gmail.com und mail.ru nicht mehr registrieren, weil dar√ºber sehr viele SPAM Accounts angelegt werden.

Hilfe

-> #montag #dienstag #mittwoch #donnerstag #freitag #samstag #sonntag
-> #monday #tuesday #wednesday #thursday #friday #saturday #sunday #silentsunday

Description:
Regeln ¬∂

"Be excellent to each other" ist leichter gesagt als getan und bedeutet f√ºr jeden etwas anderes.

Bei den folgenden Regeln handelt es sich um eine (nicht ersch√∂pfende) Liste von Verhaltensweisen, die nach dem Ermessen der Instanzmoderatoren zur L√∂schung von Toots, Stummschaltung oder Sperrung von Konten f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wie in unseren Nutzungsbedingungen geschrieben.

Bitte melde Verhaltensweisen, die dich st√∂ren. Wir werden deine Meldung vertraulich behandeln.

  • Wir dulden kein diskriminierendes Verhalten und keine Inhalte, die die Unterdr√ºckung von Angeh√∂rigen von Randgruppen f√∂rdern oder bef√ºrworten. Diese Gruppen k√∂nnen durch eine der folgenden Merkmale gekennzeichnet sein (wobei diese Liste nat√ºrlich unvollst√§ndig ist):
    • Ethnizit√§t
    • Geschlechtsidentit√§t oder -ausdruck
    • sexuelle Identit√§t oder Ausdruck
    • k√∂rperliche Merkmale oder Alter
    • Behinderung oder Krankheit
    • Staatsangeh√∂rigkeit, Wohnsitz, Aufenthaltsstatus
    • Reichtum oder Bildung
    • Religionszugeh√∂rigkeit, Agnostizismus oder Atheismus
  • Wir dulden kein bedrohliches Verhalten, Stalking und Doxxing.
  • Wir dulden keine Bel√§stigung, einschlie√ülich Brigading, Dogpiling oder jede andere Form der Kontaktaufnahme mit einem Nutzer, der angegeben hat, dass er nicht kontaktiert werden m√∂chte.
  • Wir dulden kein Mobbing, einschlie√ülich Beschimpfungen, absichtliche Falschbenennung oder Deadnaming.
  • Wir dulden keine gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, keine Nazi-Symbolik und keine F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus.
  • Wir dulden keine Verschw√∂rungsnarrative oder andere reaktion√§re Mythen, die das oben genannte (und/oder √§hnliche) Verhalten unterst√ºtzen oder dazu f√ºhren.
  • Handlungen, die darauf abzielen, diese Instanz oder ihre Leistung zu besch√§digen, k√∂nnen zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos f√ºhren.
  • Inhalte, die in Deutschland illegal sind, werden gel√∂scht und k√∂nnen zur sofortigen Sperrung des Kontos f√ºhren.


Best practices ¬∂

Die folgende Liste ist eine Sammlung von Verhaltensweisen, die wir von unseren Nutzern erwarten. Wenn du einen Nutzer siehst, der gegen diese bew√§hrten Praktiken verst√∂√üt und dich st√∂rt, meldee dies bitte und wir werden mit ihm sprechen.

  • Nutze generell die zur Verf√ºgung gestellten Mittel, um eine r√ºcksichtsvolle und zug√§ngliche Atmosph√§re zu schaffen. Dazu geh√∂rt auch die gro√üz√ºgige Verwendung von Inhaltswarnungen (insbesondere bei potenziell beunruhigenden oder kontroversen Themen) und die Verwendung von Untertiteln f√ºr Mediendateien.
  • Wenn m√∂glich, solltes du in deinen Beitr√§gen auch andere kreative Arbeiten benennen, die nicht deine eigenen sind.
  • Unaufgeforderte Kommentare √ºber die pers√∂nlichen Entscheidungen, den Lebensstil oder die Familie eines anderen Nutzers werden nicht geduldet und k√∂nnen als Bel√§stigung angesehen werden. Unangemessene sexuelle Aufmerksamkeit, Kommentare √ºber das Aussehen und die Andeutung von K√∂rperkontakt werden gegen√ºber einem nicht einwilligenden Nutzer nicht toleriert.
  • Wenn du sexuelle oder blutige Inhalte ver√∂ffentlichst, verwende Inhaltswarnungen.
  • Wenn du Werbung ver√∂ffentlichst, solltest du eine Inhaltswarnung verwenden. Die Werbung sollte nicht √ºbertrieben oder automatisiert sein.
  • Bots d√ºrfen nur dann mit einem Nutzer interagieren, wenn sie von diesem dazu aufgefordert werden.
  • Automatisierte Beitr√§ge und hochfrequente Beitr√§ge sollten unlisted (f√ºr alle sichtbar gemacht werden, aber nicht in der lokalen Timeline erscheinen), damit die lokale Timeline unserer Instanz ein Ort des Gemeinschaftsdialogs und der menschlichen Interaktion bleibt. Dies gilt auch f√ºr Bots, Feed-Poster, Twitter-"Retweets" und Twitter-Crossposts mit unterbrochenen Erw√§hnungen. Crossposter-Konten, die sich nicht mehr aktiv an unserer Gemeinschaft beteiligen, k√∂nnen nach dem Ermessen der Moderatoren entfernt werden.
  • Bleib in Diskussionen bitte h√∂flich und beleidige deine Gespr√§chspartner nicht. Beachte, dass Ironie, Sarkasmus oder √§hnliche Formen der Sprache sich nicht gut in die Schriftsprache √ºbertragen lassen und dazu neigen, Diskussionen oder Missverst√§ndnisse zu eskalieren.

(Diese Best Practices wurden durch die Bedingungen von chaos.social und bsd.network inspiriert. Wir danken!)

Unterst√ºtzung ¬∂

Ich stelle dizl.de werbe- und trackerfrei in meiner Freizeit zur Verf√ºgung. Daf√ºr fallen derzeit folgende Kosten an:

  • Server f√ºr ca. 33,55 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat
  • S3-Speicher f√ºr Medien f√ºr etwa 20 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat
  • die Domain dizl.de f√ºr 0,3875 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat (4,65 ‚Ç¨ pro Jahr)
  • Gesamt: 53,94 ‚Ç¨ pro Monat

Wir machen dies gerne und erwarten keine Gegenleistung von euch. Wenn ihr uns dennoch etwas zur√ºckgeben m√∂chten, k√∂nnt ihr dies auf verschiedene Weise tun:

Gerne als monatlich wiederholende Unterst√ºtzung:
Zahlung per Apple Pay, Google Pay, Kreditkarte, Lastschrift etc.

Oder einmalig
Zahlung per Apple Pay, Google Pay, Kreditkarte, Lastschrift etc.

Oder √ºber ein dieser M√∂glichkeiten:

  • via Liberapay
  • via open collective
  • ko-fi via PayPal
  • via PayPal
  • via √úberweisung/Dauerauftrag: melde dich bitte per Mail: info@dizl.de

Bisherige Unterst√ºtzungen:

In 2022 wurde dizl.de durch viele User unterst√ºtzt. Insgesamt sind so 470,63 ‚Ç¨ zusammen gekommen. Damit konnten alle Kosten nahezu abgedeckt werden.

Vielen Dank an alle bisherigen Unterst√ºtzer!

Resources ¬∂

Weitere Informationen zu unserer Instanz finden Sie in unserem GitHub Repository, das auch eine Liste der derzeit gesperrten oder stillgelegten Instanzen enth√§lt.

Diese Instanz enth√§lt Links zu externen Webseiten, auf deren Inhalte ich keinen Einfluss habe. Deshalb kann ich f√ºr diese fremden Inhalte auch keine Gew√§hr √ºbernehmen. Description:
Mastodon.Radio is a space for the Amateur (Ham) Radio community, anyone interested in Shortwave Listening (SWL), etc.

We're not the only amateur radio focused instance, we connect with the servers listed on fediverse.radio and you'll get a very similar experience on any of these servers.

Are you in the Americas? Our "sister-server" mastodon.hams.social is more local-to-you and may be worth a look.

We also offer:

  • xmpp
  • ntfy
  • webring

Mastodon.radio is a safe space for LGBTQ+ people and is entirely funded by its users.

Details of costs and how to donate are on Liberapay

Come join us and talk radio, technology, and more!

Amateur radio emoji, Alex Emoji, and the "angry sun" emoji used on this instance were created by @dzuk@weirder.earth
Short:
Mastodon.Radio is a space for the Amateur (Ham) Radio community, anyone interested in Shortwave Listening (SWL), etc.
Come join us and talk radio, technology, and more!

Hetzner Cloud


Regeln

Da "Geht gut miteinander um" einfacher gesagt als getan ist, haben wir eine (nicht vollst√§ndige) Liste von Verhaltensweisen aufgestellt, die zu einer L√∂schung von Toots und zu einer Blockierung von Accounts f√ºhren k√∂nnen, wenn die Probleme fortbestehen. Insbesondere tolerieren wir nicht:

  • Bel√§stigung, Stalking, Doxxing
  • Verbreitung von Verschw√∂rungstheorien und/oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
  • Rassismus, Sexismus, Beschimpfungen oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
  • Diskriminierung von Geschlechtern und sexuellen Minderheiten oder deren Bef√ºrwortung
  • Gewaltt√§tige nationalistische Propaganda, Nazi-Symbolismus oder F√∂rderung der Ideologie des Nationalsozialismus
  • Leute kontaktieren, die klar gemacht haben, dass sie keinen Kontakt wollen. Dogpiling
  • Nicht markierte Werbung
  • Nicht getaggte oder automatisierte oder √ºberm√§√üige Werbung
  • sexueller Inhalt oder Gewaltdarstellungen
  • Bots, die ohne ihre expliziten Anfragen mit Nutzer interagieren

Bitte melden Sie Verhalten, das Sie st√∂rt an #markusblogde. Das schlie√üt Verhalten von anderen Instanzen mit ein - wir sind sehr gerne bereit, mit Asshole-Instanzen die Verbindung zu unterbrechen.

Basierend auf dem "About" von chaos.social, verf√ºgbar in deren Github-Repository.


Rules

Since "Be excellent to each other" is much easier said than done, we have a (non-exhaustive) list of behaviours that may lead to deletion of toots, and silencing or suspension of accounts, if problems persist. In particular, we do not tolerate:

  • Harrassment, stalking, doxxing
  • Racism, sexism, verbal abuse or advocation thereof
  • Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof
  • Violent nationalist propaganda, Nazi symbolism or promoting the ideology of National Socialism
  • Contacting people who made clear they want no contact. Dogpiling/brigading
  • Untagged advertisement
  • Untagged, or automated, or excessive advertisement
  • sexual content or gore
  • Bots interacting with users without their explicit requests

Please report behaviour that bothers you. That includes behaviour from other instances - we are very willing stop federating with asshole instances.

Based on the about of chaos.social available in their Github-repository.

FR: Code de conduite:

Pas de spambot, pas de harc√®lement ou de drague relou, soyez sympas. Nous suivons des r√®gles respectant l'inclusion, la mod√©ration des contenus faite par des humains, nous r√©alisons des sauvegardes automatis√©es, nous communiquons sur les br√®ches de s√©curit√©, et r√©alisons de la pr√©vention de harc√®lement en bloquant les instances manifestement illicites ou celles r√©alisant du spam.
Chaque utilisateur est l√©galement tenu pour responsable des choses qu'il publie, que ce soit publiquement ou en priv√©.

Cette instance est g√©n√©raliste, amicale des personnes LGBT+, r√©gie par la loi fran√ßaise.
Nous ne supportons pas la publication de contenus racistes, de d√©sinformations diverses (complotisme et pseudo sciences) et mod√©rons les posts contrevenant √† nos r√®gles et les spams en tout genre. La libert√© d'expression est une chose pr√©cieuse, cependant vous devez savoir que cela ne vous permet pas de publier des contenus ill√©gaux ou des appels √† la haine (par exemple) sans aucune cons√©quence.
Si nos mod√©rateurs et mod√©ratrices b√©n√©voles (c'est important) vous soulignent que tel ou tel message est inconvenant ou finissent par vous montrer la sortie parce que vous ne respectez pas les CGU, √† aucun moment votre libert√© d'expression n'aura √©t√© bafou√©e. Vous pouvez toujours vous exprimer ailleurs, et nous souhaitons garder notre √©nergie de b√©n√©vole (j'insiste), qui est limit√©e, √† meilleur escient.
Notamment pour passer plus de temps agr√©able avec des personnes qui respectent les r√®gles.


L'utilisation de bots est restreinte selon notre bon vouloir.
Le serveur est h√©berg√© en France et respecte la r√©glementation RGPD.
Les m√©dias sexy / not safe for work sont les bienvenus tant qu'ils sont marqu√©s comme tels. Songez √† marquer votre compte int√©gralement en NSFW si vous comptez poster uniquement ce genre de contenus, afin de ne pas avoir √† le sp√©cifier manuellement √† chaque fois.
Ces r√®gles sont amen√©es √† √©voluer r√©guli√®rement selon le consensus des mod√©rateurs et mod√©ratrices b√©n√©voles sur cette instance Mastodon.

Joyeuses conversations!
N'oubliez pas de rester cordiaux et de lire les contenus des messages avant de les repartager. Prenez soin de d√©battre sur les arguments sans attaquer les personnes, prenez connaissance de ce qui constitue des arguments fallacieux pour am√©liorer la qualit√© des discussions.

Si quelque chose qui ne va pas, envoyez un message priv√© aux mod√©rateurs et admins, nous seront ravis de pouvoir vous aider.

@modominem @louisemile @hadodoh @tykayn

Soutenez nous:

EN: Code of conduct:

No spambot, no harassment or flirting, just be nice. We follow rules that respect inclusion, moderation of content by humans, we make automated backups, we communicate about security breaches, and we prevent harassment by blocking obviously illegal or spamming instances.
Each user is legally responsible for the things he publishes, whether publicly or privately.

This body is generalist, friendly to LGBT+ people, governed by French law.
We do not support the publication of racist content, misinformation (conspiracy and pseudo-science) and moderate posts that violate our rules and spam of any kind. Freedom of expression is a precious thing, however you should know that this does not allow you to publish illegal content or hate speech (for example) without any consequences. If our volunteer moderators (this is important) point out to you that this or that message is inappropriate or end up showing you out because you do not respect the TOS, at no time will your freedom of expression have been violated. You can always express yourself elsewhere, and we want to keep our limited volunteer energy (I insist), which is limited, to better use.
Especially to spend more enjoyable time with people who respect the rules.


The use of bots is restricted at our discretion.
The server is hosted in France and complies with the RGPD.
regulation. Sexy / not safe for work media are welcome as long as they are marked as such. Consider branding your account fully NSFW if you are only going to post this kind of content, so you don't have to manually specify it every time.
These rules will evolve regularly according to the consensus of the volunteer moderators on this Mastodon body.

Happy Conversations!
Don't forget to be cordial and to read the contents of the messages before sharing them again. Take care to debate the arguments without attacking people, be aware of what constitutes spurious arguments to improve the quality of the discussions.

If something goes wrong, send a private message to the moderators and admins, we will be happy to help you.

Support us:

Description:
Generell informasjon

Kva er Mastodon?

Snabelen er ein av mange versjonar av det desentraliserte og f√∏dererte sosiale media nettverket Mastodon. Vi er eit alternativ for dei som √∏nskjer √• v√¶re p√• nettet uta p√•trengande reklame, algoritmar og overv√•kingskapitalisme.

Om begreper som "desentraliserte og f√∏derererte sosiale medier" seier deg lite, hald p√• motet! Du treng ikkje √• vite disse tinga for √• bruke snabelen.no men om du er nysgjerrig kan du lesa meir om Mastodon her.

Detta er eit spleiselag!

Bli med √• dekke utgiftene for nettverket. Snabelen er ikkje ein bedrift og tenar ikkje pengar p√• √• drive med dette. Faktisk s√• er det heller ein utgift. Ein hyggelig utgift. Tor Christian dekker alle kostnadene av egen lomme og har gjort det siden starten - med unntak donasjoner fr√• brukare. Dette er den mest lengstlevende og mest stabile norske heimstaden for Mastodon. Dersom du √∏nsker √• vere med √• halde snabelen i gong s√• kan du bli med p√• spleise laget p√• https://www.patreon.com/snabelenno.

Lurar du p√• andre norske mastodon heimstader?

Snabelen er ikkje det eineste norske mastodon heimstad i Noreg. Mastodon er eit spredt nettverk med masse heimstader som har forskjellige fokus og tilbyr forskjellige ting. Vi pr√∏ver √• liste eit par av dei.

  • oslo.town - Ein regional mastodon tenar for dei som bur i Oslo
  • samenet.social - Ein samisk mastodon tenar med fokus p√• samisk spr√•k og identitet.

For fleire versjoner eller tenare av Mastodon, bes√∏k her.
Short: Ein norsk heimstad for den desentraliserte mikroblogge-plattformen.

Description:
Welcome to Romancelandia.Club!

This mastodon instance originated as a place for fans of romance novels to talk about their shared interests. There is, however, no need to stay "on topic." All readers, writers, reviewers, bloggers, academics, and industry folk are welcome.

This site is currently organized by @willaful (with assistance from her in-house geek, @mom).

The Romancelandia.Club Code of Conduct

We want this to be a fun, pleasant, and harassment-free experience for everyone, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion. We do not tolerate harassment of participants in any form.

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately. If someone asks you to leave them alone, leave them alone.

Unacceptable Behavior

The following behavior is unwelcome anywhere at Romancelandia.Club:

  • Offensive comments related to gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, mental illness, neuro(a)typicality, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion.
  • Holocaust denial and Nazi symbolism.
  • Promotion of fascist, supremacist, or hateful ideology or symbolism, including in choice of user name or avatar.
  • Deliberate or persistent misgendering.
  • Threats of violence.
  • Incitement of violence towards any individual, including encouraging a person to commit suicide or to engage in self-harm.
  • Deliberate intimidation.
  • Publication of any individual's address, phone number, or other private identifying information without consent.
  • Sexual depictions of children.
  • Unwelcome sexual attention, including sharing sexual content with specific users without consent.
  • Simulated physical contact (e.g. textual descriptions like ‚Äú*hug*‚Äù or ‚Äú*backrub*‚Äù) without consent or after a request to stop.
  • Publication of non-harassing private communication without consent.
  • Sustained disruption of discussion.
  • Continued communications with someone who's asked that you leave them alone.
  • Unwelcome comments regarding a person‚Äôs lifestyle choices and practices, including those related to food, health, parenting, drugs, or employment.

The following behavior is unwelcome on the public timeline:

  • Graphic violent or sexual material without a content wrapper.
  • Gratuitous advertising or spam. It's fine to promote your work, but it shouldn't be the bulk of what you share, and we request that it be kept unobtrusive (see "best practices" below).

Known Harassers:

The admins may ban or silence users whom we know to be harassers or abusers, even if they have not violated the rules of this instance. The mere presence of a harasser can make past or potential victims uncomfortable, and it can put potential victims who are unaware of the person's history in particular danger. Users are encouraged to individually mute, block, and/or report accounts they don't want to see, but at our discretion, we may take the additional step of blocking or silencing someone instance-wide if we believe they endanger the safe and welcoming space we're trying to maintain.

Reporting

The current admins are:

  • @willaful
  • @mom

If you are being harassed, notice that someone else is being harassed, or have any other concerns, please contact the admins. They'll respond as promptly as they can.

We will respect confidentiality requests for the purpose of protecting victims of abuse. At our discretion, we may publicly name a person about whom we‚Äôve received harassment complaints, or privately warn third parties about them. We will not name harassment victims without their affirmative consent

We will prioritize marginalized people‚Äôs safety over privileged people‚Äôs comfort, and reserve the right not to act on complaints regarding:

  • "Reverse" -isms, such as "reverse racism," "reverse sexism," "cisphobia", etc.
  • Users pointing out racist, sexist, cissexist, or otherwise oppressive behavior or assumptions.
  • Reasonable communication of boundaries, such as ‚Äúleave me alone,‚Äù ‚Äúgo away,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI‚Äôm not discussing this with you.‚Äù
  • Tone policing.

Consequences

Participants asked to stop any harassing behavior are expected to comply immediately.

If a participant engages in harassing behavior, the admins may take any action they deem appropriate, up to and including expulsion from Romancelandia.Club and identifying the participant publicly as someone about whom we've received complaints.

Be aware that not every user or post you see in your timeline is a member registered at Romancelandia.Club. Users of Romancelandia.Club itself are expected to adhere to this code of conduct, and may expect to be engaged in respectful dialogue with an admin if there is any indication that transgressions were a mistake or lapse. Users from other instances may not feel bound by our CoC terms, but violations from non-local accounts will not receive further grace in moderation decisions.

Best Practices

The following aren't hard and fast rules, just suggestions for a positive community experience:

  • Please help keep the community accessible and considerate. In particular, we appreciate alt-text captioning of media files, and the use of content wrappers when a post is likely to be disturbing or triggering for other users.
  • Content wrappers are widely used on Mastodon, and seen as a polite consideration when posting on a topic that others might not wish to engage with immediately (for example: "US election", "mental health", "bad day, personal"). Whether to use them in such cases is up to you, but we encourage you to be open to the idea. We only require content wrappers when a post contains graphic sexual content or gore.
  • When possible, please provide credit for creative works in your posts that are not your own.
  • Advertisements should not be excessive or automated.
  • When promoting your own work, consider the use of a content wrapper, or descriptive hashtags (for example, #Promo, #AuthorPromo, #SelfPromo, #Giveaway, #Sales, etc) so that your post can more easily be found by those who want to see it and avoided by those who don't.

Automated Content

  • If posting automated or high-frequency content, please mark it as unlisted. This will make it visible to all users, but omit it from the local timeline.
  • Bots may only interact with users who've invited them to do so.
  • Accounts that only cross-post messages from another service, but never engage as active participants here, may be silenced or removed.

Copyright Infringement

Romancelandia Club respects the intellectual property rights of others. Per the DMCA, we will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement on the Site if submitted to our Copyright Agent as described below. Upon receipt of a notice alleging copyright infringement, We will take whatever action it deems appropriate within its sole discretion, including removal of the allegedly infringing materials and termination of access for repeat infringers of copyright protected content.

If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated by us or by a third party who has uploaded materials to our website, please provide the following information to the designated Copyright Agent listed below:

  • A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed;
  • A description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Site;
  • An address, telephone number, and email address where we can contact you and, if different, an email address where the alleged infringing party, if not we, can contact you;
  • A statement that you have a good-faith belief that the use is not authorized by the copyright owner or other intellectual property rights owner, by its agent, or by law;
  • A statement by you under penalty of perjury that the information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual property owner or are authorized to act on the owner's behalf;
  • Your electronic or physical signature.

Romancelandia Club may request additional information before removing any allegedly infringing material. In the event we remove the allegedly infringing materials, we will immediately notify the person responsible for posting such materials that we removed or disabled access to the materials. We may also provide the responsible person with your email address so that the person may respond to your allegations.

Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. 512(c). Romancelandia Club designated Copyright Agent is:

Jonathan Bailey
CopyByte
3157 Gentilly Blvd Suite # 2254
New Orleans, LA 70122
Phone: 1-504-356-4555
Email: romancelandia-dmca@copybyte.com

This code of conduct is based on the one at the Wandering Shop, which is based on Annalee Flower Horne's Sample Slack Code of Conduct, which is in turn based on Geek Feminism's Community Anti-Harassment Policy.

Description:
Wir bieten in unserer Mastodon-Instanz bewusst eine andere Art Rahmenbau zum Ausprobieren an. Der Zugang zum Fediversum via digitalcourage.social wird mit ‚Ç¨1 pro Monat berechnet.

Alle Menschen, die sich f√ºr eine lebenswerte Welt engagieren wollen, sind bei uns willkommen. Wir m√∂chten einen respektvollen Umgang miteinander pflegen und gute Gastgeberinnen und Gastgeber sein. Sollte uns das einmal nicht gelingen, gehen Sie bitte nicht einfach nur still weg, sondern sprechen Sie uns unter @freiheit@digitalcourage.social bitte an, damit wir sicher stellen k√∂nnen, dass sich alle Beteiligten bei uns wohlf√ºhlen und einbringen k√∂nnen.

Wer uns kennt, wei√ü: Wir legen besonderen Wert auf Datenschutz. Zum Beispiel kann unser Moderationsteam nie die IP-Adressen der Nutzenden sehen. Die Instanz ist Mitglied von Fedimin.net und unterst√ºtzt das Serverabkommen.

Um die Suchfunktion zu verbessern und die f√∂derierte Zeitleiste anzureichern, ist diese Instanz an die ActivityPub-Relays https://relay.fedimins.net/ und https://de.relay.pfalz.social/ angeschlossen.

Nat√ºrlich kann auch von anderen Fediverse-Servern dem Account von Digitalcourage @digitalcourage@digitalcourage.social gefolgt werden.

K√ºndigung: Teilnehmende k√∂nnen ihren Mastodon-Account jederzeit selbst l√∂schen. Dar√ºber werden aber weder die System-Admins noch die Buchhaltung automatisch informiert. Um den Einzug des Kostenbeitrags zu beenden, ist es also aus technischen Gr√ºnden n√∂tig, eine E-Mail an mastodon-admin@digitalcourage.de mit dem Betreff Kostenbeitrag zu schreiben.

Description:
Ol√°!

Sejam bem vindos √† mastodon.com.br, uma inst√¢ncia do Mastodon voltada para falantes de portugu√™s brasileiro.

Com a inten√ß√£o de ser um espa√ßo acolhedor e menos t√≥xico, tentamos ser uma inst√¢ncia que abriga pessoas de todas nacionalidades, etnias, formatos de corpos, g√™neros, neurodivergentes, de identidades e orienta√ß√µes sexuais diversas.

Para que isso funcione a inst√¢ncia √© moderada.

Nosso time de modera√ß√£o atual √© composto por:

  • @dani (ela/dela)
  • @claus (ele/dele)
  • @julia (ela/dela)
  • @Pinoinha (ele/dele)

Todos usu√°rios precisam seguir o c√≥digo de conduta aqui descrito.

C√≥digo de conduta

Os administradores e moderadores se reservam o direito de banir usu√°rios que n√£o seguirem as seguintes regras da inst√¢ncia:

  • N√£o seja um/a/e arrombado/a/e.
  • N√£o crie brigas e intrigas repetidamente, causando mal estar na comunidade.
  • N√£o utilize as timelines p√∫blicas (local e global/federada) como sala de chat sem uso de cita√ß√£o ou reply.

Temas e comportamentos proibidos que resultar√£o em ban sem recurso

  • Discursos racistas, sexistas, homof√≥bicos, transf√≥bicos, capacitistas, xenof√≥bicos, islamof√≥bicos, gordof√≥bicos.
  • Apologia ao nazismo ou fascismo.
  • Maus-tratos ou crueldade contra animais.
  • Publica√ß√£o ou reprodu√ß√£o de fake news
  • Publica√ß√£o de pornografia infantil e lolicon.
  • Amea√ßa de publica√ß√£o ou publica√ß√£o de conte√∫do privado (doxxing).
  • Avan√ßos sexuais indesejados. Isso inclui piadas ou coment√°rios sexuais. N√£o √© n√£o, se a pessoa n√£o te deu liberdade, n√£o fa√ßa.
  • Discurso que romantiza e/ou incentiva pr√°ticas nocivas ao bem-estar f√≠sico ou mental como dist√∫rbios alimentares, automutila√ß√£o (cutting) e suic√≠dio.
  • Crossposting (posts vindos de outras redes, como o Twitter) em timelines p√∫blicas (local e global/federada).
  • Spam (mensagens indesejadas ou n√£o requisitadas).
  • Flood (postar repetidamente ou pequenas mensagens sem intervalo) nas timelines p√∫blicas (local e global/federada).
  • Intimida√ß√£o deliberada, stalking.
  • Criar contas para se passar por celebridades ou marcas. Contas par√≥dia ou contas de f√£ precisam estar explicitamente sinalizadas.
  • Fancam flood.

Pol√≠tica de aviso de conte√∫do (CW)

O Mastodon possui uma funcionalidade chamada de "aviso de conte√∫do", em ingl√™s ‚Äúcontent warning‚Äù ou ‚ÄúCW‚Äù.

O uso de aviso de conte√∫do √© obrigatorio em postagens que:

  • Mencionam assuntos traum√°ticos (por exemplo: abuso, estupro, viol√™ncia).
  • Contenham enredo de s√©ries, jogos e filmes (por exemplo: "Spoilers de Power Rangers S01E01").
  • Contenham nudez, conte√∫do sexual e imagens de viol√™ncia (mesmo que em representa√ß√µes art√≠sticas).
  • Descri√ß√µes expl√≠citas de sexo ou conte√∫do sexual em postagens p√∫blicas.
  • V√≠deos com movimentos r√°pidos e luzes intermitentes.

Temas que o uso do aviso de conte√∫do √© de bom tom e deixa todo mundo feliz:

  • Futebol
  • Pol√≠tica
  • Dist√∫rbios mentais
  • Dist√∫rbios alimentares
  • Relacionamentos abusivos
  • Comida
  • √Ålcool, cigarro e outras drogas
  • Aranhas, r√©pteis e outras coisas que podem causar desconforto em pessoas que possuem fobias
  • Retratos de si, principalmente aquelas com contato visual direto

Sobre Crossposters

Crossposters s√£o ferramentas, automatizadas ou n√£o, usadas para postar a partir de outras redes (como Twitter ou Tumblr) para o Mastodon. O uso destas ferramentas √© permitido, mas as seguintes regras se aplicam:

  • N√£o podem ser postados com privacidade p√∫blica.
  • Posts vindos de outras redes, como o Twitter, ainda precisam obedecer √† outras regras desse c√≥digo, tais como avisos de conte√∫do.
  • S√≥ podem ser usados na condi√ß√£o de que voc√™ acompanha as suas notifica√ß√µes, do contr√°rio resultar√° em suspens√£o ap√≥s uma advert√™ncia.

Sobre n√≠veis de privacidade

No Mastodon cada status pode ser postado em quatro diferentes configura√ß√µes de audi√™ncia. √â importante ter isso em mente porque certas regras s√≥ se aplicam a determinadas configura√ß√µes:

  • P√∫blica: A publica√ß√£o √© enviada para as timelines local e global/federada, compartilhadas por outros membros da inst√¢ncia, √© enviada para todos os seguidores, aparece na p√°gina p√∫blica de perfil da pessoa que postou, aparece em buscas por hashtags.
  • N√£o listada: A publica√ß√£o √© enviada para todos os seguidores, aparece na p√°gina p√∫blica de perfil da pessoa que postou, n√£o aparece em buscas por hashtags e n√£o aparece em timelines local ou global/federada.
  • Privada ("Followers only"): A publica√ß√£o √© enviada apenas para os seguidores.
  • Direta: A publica√ß√£o √© enviada apenas para os usu√°rios mencionados.

üö® IMPORTANTE üö®

No Mastodon nenhum post, incluindo mensagens diretas (DM), √© criptografado de ponta-a-ponta ("end-to-end encryption", ou "E2EE"). Para mensagens sens√≠veis, que necessitam de maior privacidade, recomendamos o uso de messenger criptografado de ponta-a-ponta como o Signal.

Como reportar uma viola√ß√£o do c√≥digo de conduta

Qualquer post ou perfil, mesmo de outra inst√¢ncia que voc√™ acredite que esteja em viola√ß√£o dessas regras pode ser denunciado utilizando a ferramenta interna do Mastodon e ele ser√° enviado aos moderadores.

Voc√™ pode fazer uma den√∫ncia mesmo que a sua situa√ß√£o n√£o seja diretamente coberta por essas regras, caso a situa√ß√£o lhe cause desconforto. A modera√ß√£o ir√° avaliar cada situa√ß√£o individualmente.

Caso a sua den√∫ncia seja relativa a um dos moderadores, voc√™ pode reportar a viola√ß√£o atrav√©s de mensagem direta √† um dos outros moderadores.

Fazemos um esfor√ßo para que as den√∫ncias sejam processadas em at√© 24 horas, mas somos pessoas com vidas fora do Mastodon e eventualmente pode demorar um pouco mais.

Inatividade

Contas inativas por mais de um ano est√£o sujeitas a serem removidas da plataforma. Enviaremos um aviso alguns dias antes, dando a possibilidade que a pessoa possa manter a conta.
Short: O mastodon.com.br √© uma inst√¢ncia voltada para falantes de portugu√™s brasileiro. Com a inten√ß√£o de ser um espa√ßo acolhedor e menos t√≥xico, tentamos ser uma inst√¢ncia que abriga pessoas de todas nacionalidades, etnias, formatos de corpos, g√™neros, neurodivergentes, de identidades e orienta√ß√µes sexuais diversas.

Description:
mastodon.la

Donaciones para mastodon.la en ko-fi

Mastodon.la es una instancia generalista y ligeramente moderada. Bienvenidos todos los temas con buena onda, respeto y sin desnudos innecesarios :). Castellano/Espa√±ol y otros lenguages bienvenidos.

Mastodon.la is a generalist instance lightly moderated. All opinions are welcome. Be cool, respectful and leave your clothes on if possible :) Spanish is preferred, but all languages are welcome.

C√≥digo de conducta

Version 4

En general asumimos que somos todos adultos responsables con la "piel dura". Es decir que estamos preparados para recibir opiniones tan suaves o tan duras como las que emitimos. Tambien asumimos que hay una intenci√≥n de divertirse e informarse sin generar un ambiente hostil.

Esta instancia se regir√° por este c√≥digo de conducta. Resumidas en estas reglas:

1. Todos los comentarios son personales. Las textos y opiniones escritos son responsabilidad del autor. Esta instancia, sus administradores y moderadores no avalan ninguna de las opiniones publicadas.

2. La instancia, sus administradores y moderadores no apoya fachistas o nazis. Tampoco apoya sus expresiones ni sus ataques contra minor√≠as. Esto no es Gab.

3. Mantenegamos todos un tono relativamente civilizado.

4. Recordemos que del otro lado hay una persona con sentimientos. No destratar innecesariamente.

5. No publiquemos datos privados de otros miembros de la instancia. Esto incluye capturas de pantalla de sus mensajes.

6. La pornograf√≠a infantil esta prohibida y es ilegal! Ser√° considerada pornograf√≠a infantil todo mensaje o imagen donde se combine sexualidad con im√°genes de menores de 18 a√±os. Si un mensaje o foto o pintura combina ni√±os o menores de 18 a√±os en un contexto sexual de cualquier tipo sin importar lo sutil o indirecto que sea, mejor no la publiques. Cualquier insinuaci√≥n de pornograf√≠a infantil ser√° reportada r√°pidamente al FBI junto con todos los datos colectados.

7 Para participar, debes ser mayor de edad (18 a√±os).

8 Los datos y contenidos no se venden ni comercializan.

9 Protegemos la informaci√≥n y mantenemos la instancia segura aplicando las √∫ltimos parches y actualizaciones. Es un esfuerzo constante. Sin embargo, puede ocurrir que, a pesar de nuestros esfuerzos, alguien hackee uno o varios servidores. Tengase presente antes de enviar cualquier informaci√≥n considerada sensible.

10 Como parte de nuestra labor, mantenemos copias de respaldo de todos los datos en la instancia. De ser necesario, restauraremos todos los datos con la √∫ltima copia de respaldo disponible. Puede, sin embargo, ocurrir que algunos toots se pierdan. Todos aceptaremos la p√©rdida, incluso si es irreparable, con tristeza y resignaci√≥n, y luego, seguiremos con nuestras vidas.

11 Almacenamos cierta informaci√≥n, como el correo electr√≥nico, la IP de origen y algunas cosas mas, necesarias para el funcionamiento del sistema. Tambien almacenamos la informaci√≥n provista por los usuarios y los toots :-) Si decides usar esta instancia, implica que aceptas y nos autorizas a hacerlo.

12 Esta instancia usa varias tecnolog√≠as y servicios necesarios para su funcionamiento. Una lista incompleta incluye: proveedores de servicios DNS, hosting, S3, CDN y defensas contra DDOS y otros tipos de ataques inform√°ticos. La informaci√≥n puede circular por estos servicios que son externos a la instancia. El solo hecho de usar esta instancia implica que autorizas todas estas operaciones sobre los datos.

13 Las cuentas se pueden borrar y la informaci√≥n purgar como se explica en los manuales de usuario de mastodon. Cada usuario es responsable de llevar adelante estas operaciones cuando mejor le convenga (si quiere). No es una tarea de los moderadores hacer este tipo de limpiezas.

14 A veces (pocas), un administrador o moderador esconder√° un toot, o lo borrar√°, o suspender√° a un usuario por violaciones evidentes a este c√≥digo de conducta. Esas decisiones se pueden apelar una vez al mismo moderador o a otro. Despues de lo cual la decisi√≥n es final.

15 Cada tanto revisaremos este c√≥digo de conducta. Estamos abiertos a sugerencias y cambios. Por favor, escriban sus aportes en toots.

- La Administraci√≥n.

Code of conduct

Version 4

In general we assume that we are all responsible adults with "hard skin". In other words, we are prepared to receive opinions as soft or as hard as those we issue. We also assume that there is an intention to have fun and learn without creating a hostile environment.

This instance will be governed by this code of conduct. Summarized in these rules:

1. All comments are personal. Written texts and opinions are the responsibility of the author. This instance, its administrators and moderators do not endorse any of the opinions published.

2. This instance, its admins and moderators do not support fascism or nazis. we do not support their expressions and attacks against minorities. This is not Gab.

3. Let's all keep a relatively civil tone.

4. Remember that on the other side there is a person with feelings. Do not weed out unnecessarily.

5. We do not publish private data of other members of the instance, including screenshots.

6. Child pornography is prohibited and illegal! Any message or image that combines sexuality with images of children under 18 years of age will be classified as child pornography. If a message or photo or painting combines children or those under 18 years of age in a sexual context of any kind, no matter how subtle or indirect it is, you better not post it. Any hints of child pornography will be promptly reported to the FBI along with all the data collected.

7. To participate, you must be of legal age (18 years).

8. The data and content are not sold or commercialized.

9. We protect the information and keep the instance secure by applying the latest patches and updates. It is a constant effort. However, it may happen that, despite our efforts, someone hacks one or more servers. Please be aware before submitting any information deemed sensitive.

10. As part of our work, we keep backup copies of all data in the instance. If necessary, we will restore all data with the latest available backup copy. It may, however, happen that some toots are lost. We will all accept the loss, even if it is irreparable, with sadness and resignation, and then we will continue with our lives.

11. We store certain information, such as email, source IP and some other things, necessary for the operation of the system. We also store the information provided by users and toots :-) If you decide to use this instance, it implies that you accept and authorize us to do so.

12. This instance uses various technologies and services necessary for its operation. An incomplete list includes: DNS, hosting, S3, CDN service providers and defenses against DDOS and other types of computer attacks. Information can circulate through these services that are external to the instance. Just using this instance implies that you authorize all these operations on the data.

13. Accounts can be deleted and information can be purged as explained in the mastodon user manuals. Each user is responsible for carrying out these operations when it is best for them (if they want). It is not a task of the moderators to do this type of cleaning.

14. Sometimes (few), an administrator or moderator will hide a toot, delete it, or suspend a user for obvious violations of this code of conduct. Those decisions can be appealed once to the same moderator or to another. After which the decision is final.

15. We will review this code of conduct from time to time. We are open to suggestions and changes. Please write your contributions in toots.

- The Administration.
Short:
Mastodon.la es una instancia generalista y ligeramente moderada. Bienvenidos todos los temas con buena onda, respeto y sin desnudos innecesarios :). Castellano/Espa√±ol y otros lenguages bienvenidos.
/
Mastodon.la is a generalist instance lightly moderated. All opinions are welcome. Be cool, respectful and leave your clothes on if possible :) 
Spanish preferred but all languages are welcome.

Description:
Note 1: Please request a new account using your webbrowser, where we explain what we want to know from you.

Note 2: This server will not federate with Meta's (formerly Facebook) Threads, as decided by the community.

Todon.eu is a radical leftist anti-authoritarian Mastodon server. We welcome anarchists, socialists, (climate) activists, the LGBTQIA+ community, environmentalists, anti-racists, anti-fascists, anti-capitalists, intersectionalists, vegans, pirates, human rights activists, etc. As far as they are radical, leftist and anti-authoritarian.

Learn more ‚ü∂

Todon.eu ist ein linksradikaler, antiautorit√§rer Mastodon-Server. Wir hei√üen Anarchist_innen, Sozialist_innen, (Klima-)Aktivist_innen, LSBTQIA+ Personen, Umweltbewegung, Antirassist_innen, Antifaschist_innen, Antikapitalist_innen, Intersektionalist_innen, Veganer_innen, Pirat_innen, Menschenrechtler_innen, etc. willkommen. Solange sie radikal, links √∫nd antiautorit√§r sind.

Mehr erfahren ‚ü∂

Todon.eu es un servidor de Mastodon de izquierda radical antiautoritaria. Damos la bienvenida a anarquistas, socialistas, activistas (clim√°ticos), personas del colectivo LGBTQIA+, ambientalistas, anti-racistas, anti-fascistas, anti-capitalistas, interseccionalistas, veganxs, piratas, activistas por los derechos humanos, etc. Siempre que sean radicales, de izquierdas y antiautoritarios.

Saber m√°s ‚ü∂

Todon.eu is een radicaal linkse anti-autoritaire Mastodonserver. Wij verwelkomen anarchisten, socialisten, (klimaat)activisten, LHBTQIA+-personen, milieubewuste mensen, intersectionelen, antiracisten, antifascisten, antikapitalisten, veganisten, piraten, mensenrechtenactivisten, enz. Als ze maar radicaal, links √©n anti-autoritair zijn.

Let op: Je kunt ipv deze Mastodonserver ook een account aanvragen op onze tweelingserver todon.nl. Deze server heeft meer Nederlandstalige gebruikers, maar wel de dezelfde regels, beheerder en moderatoren.

Meer leren ‚ü∂

Welcome on Todon.eu! Please read first our comprehensive terms of service (including our rules) and our privacy policy.

To give you an idea ‚Äì we do not accept (among other things): racism, homophobia, transphobia, sexism, ableism and other forms of discrimination, harassment, trolling, hate speech, (sexual) abuse of minors and adults (also not virtual), glorification of violence, militarism, nationalism and right-wing populism, right-wing and religious extremism, tankies (ML), capitalists, (right-wing) conspiracy 'theories', hoaxes, and of course no spam and other forms of advertisement.

Want to join us? Tell us exactly why you want to join us! Why especially Todon.eu and not one of the many other Mastodon servers? We especially like to know what kind of leftist political beliefs you have, so that we can see if they are compatible with ours. Just help us to make our job to approve your request easier.

If you don't receive a welcome email in 24 hours, your invite request is (probably) declined.

This Mastodon server is the twin server of Todon.nl. They are both run and moderated by a small collective of volunteers. We accept all languages, although English, Dutch, German and Spanish are the most popular on this server. Moderation is in English, Dutch, Spanish, German, Danish, Swedish and Norwegian.

Features:

  • Character limit of toots: 1312 (instead of 500)
  • Search limit: 11 (instead of 5)
  • Search engine indexing disabled by default
  • Unauthenticated access to public timeline disabled
  • We do not keep unnecessary data

Themes:

  • Todon (Dark - default):
    • in the single column interface the same as the default Mastodon project theme.
    • in the advanced web interface a full width version of the default Mastodon project theme, with some minor modifications (compatible with most screen resolutions, incl. wide screens).
  • Mastodon (Light):
    • the light default project theme
    • full width in the advanced web interface, like the Todon.eu default theme.
  • Mastodon (High contrast):
    • the (dark) high contrast default project theme
    • full width in the advanced web interface, like the Todon.eu default theme.

Willkommen auf Todon.eu! Bitte lies zuerst unsere Nutzungsbedingungen (inklusive unserer Regeln) und unsere Datenschutzerkl√§rung.

Um dir einen ersten Eindruck zu vermitteln ‚Äì wir akzeptieren nicht: Rassismus, homophobes und transphobes Verhalten, Sexismus, Ableismus und andere Formen von Diskriminierung, Bel√§stigung, Trolling, Hassrede, (sexuellen) Missbrauch Minderj√§hrige und Erwachsener (auch nicht virtuell), Gewaltverherrlichung, Militarismus, Nationalismus und Rechtspopulismus sowie, rechten und religi√∂sen Extremismus, tankies (ML), Kapitalisten, (rechte) Verschw√∂rungs'theorien', Hoaxes, und nat√ºrlich Spam oder andere Formen von Werbung.

Du m√∂chtest beitreten? Sag uns genau, warum du unserem Server beitreten m√∂chtest! Wieso hast du dich f√ºr Todon.eu entschieden und nicht f√ºr eine der anderen zahlreichen Mastodon-Instanzen? Insbesondere w√ºssten wir gerne, welchen linken Anschauungen ihr euch zugeh√∂rig f√ºhlt, um zu sehen, ob diese mit den unsrigen kompatibel sind. Diese Auskunft macht es uns leichter, deine Registrierung zu best√§tigen.

Bei uns sind alle Sprachen willkommen, wobei Englisch, Niederl√§ndisch, Deutsch und Spanisch auf dieser Instanz am meisten gesprochen werden. Moderation findet auf Englisch, Niederl√§ndisch, Spanisch, Deutsch, D√§nisch, Schwedisch und Norwegisch statt.

Merkmale:

  • Zeichenbeschr√§nkungen f√ºr Toots: 1312 (anstelle von 500)
  • Suchbeschr√§nkung: 11 (anstelle von 5)
  • Wir speichern keine unn√∂tigen Daten

Farbschemata:

  • Todon (Dunkel - Standard):
    • eine Version des (dunkle) Standardinterfaces von Mastodon in voller Breite (kompatibel mit den meisten Bildschirmaufl√∂sungen, inklusive Breitbild)
  • Mastodon (Hell):
    • Das helle Standardinterface, aber in voller Breite
  • Mastodon (Hoher Kontrast):
    • Das dunkle Hochkontrastschema, aber in voller Breite

¬°Bienvenidx a todon.eu! Por favor lee los t√©rminos de servicio (incluyendo nuestras reglas) y nuestra pol√≠tica de privacidad.

Para darte una idea, no aceptamos (entre otras cosas): racismo, homofobia, transfobia, sexismos, capacitismo y cualquier otra forma de discriminaci√≥n, acoso, trolleo, discursos de odio, abuso (sexual) de menores y adultxs (medios digitales incluidos), glorificaci√≥n de la violencia, militarismo, nacionalismo y populismo de derecha, extremismo de derecha y religioso, tankies (M-L), capitalistas, 'teor√≠as' conspirativas (de derecha), bulos y por supuesto spam ni otras formas de publicidad.

¬øQuieres unirte a nosotrxs? Nos gustar√≠a que te tomaras un tiempo en decirnos por que quieres unirte a nosotrxs. ¬øPor qu√© Todon.eu y no otro de los tantos servidores de Mastodon? Especialmente nos gustar√≠a saber cuales son tus l√≠neas pol√≠ticas de izquierda para saber si son compatibles con las nuestras. Ayudanos a que nuestra labor de aprovar tu propuesta sea mas f√°cil.

Aceptamos todos los idiomas, aunque el ingl√©s, holand√©s, alem√°n y castellano son los m√°s populares aqu√≠. Lxs moderadorxs hablan ingl√©s, holand√©s, castellano, alem√°n, dan√©s, sueco y noruego.

Caracter√≠sticas:

  • L√≠mites de caracteres para toots: 1312 (en vez de 500)
  • L√≠mite de b√∫squeda: 11 (en vez de 5)
  • No conservamos datos innecesarios

Dise√±os:

  • Todon (oscuro - por defecto):
    • versi√≥n a ancho completo de pantalla del tema oscuro por defecto de Mastodon, compatible con la mayor√≠a de las resoluciones de pantalla, incluyendo pantallas anchas.
  • Mastodon (claro):
    • el tema claro por defecto, con ancho completo
  • Mastodon (alto contraste):
    • el tema de alto contraste oscuro por defecto, con ancho completo

Welkom op Todon.eu! Lees eerst onze uitgebreide gebruiksvoorwaarden (inclusief onze regels) en ons privacybeleid.

Om een idee te geven ‚Äì wij accepteren (onder andere) geen: racisme, seksisme, homofobie, transfobie, seksisme, validisme en andere vormen van discriminatie, lastig vallen van mensen, haatzaaien, getrol, (seksueel) misbruik van minder- en meerderjarigen (ook niet virtueel), verheerlijking van geweld, militarisme, nationalisme en rechts-populisme, rechts- en religieus extremisme, tankies (ML), kapitalisten, (rechtse) complot'theorie√´n', hoaxes en uiteraard geen spam en andere vormen van reclame.

Wil je hier een account? Vertel ons precies waarom je je hier wilt aanmelden! Waarom speciaal Todon.eu en niet √©√©n van de vele andere Mastodonservers? We willen vooral weten wat voor linkse politieke overtuiging je hebt, zodat we kunnen zien of deze compatibel is met die van ons. Help ons gewoonweg om onze taak om jouw aanvraag goed te keuren eenvoudiger te maken.

Deze Mastodonserver is de tweelingserver van Todon.nl. Ze worden beiden beheerd en gemodereerd door een klein collectief van vrijwilligers. Wij accepteren alle talen, hoewel Engels, Nederlands, Duits en Spaans het populairst zijn op deze Mastodonserver. Moderatie is in het Engels, Nederlands, Spaans, Duits, Deens, Zweeds en Noors.

Kenmerken:

  • Maximaal aantal tekens voor toots: 1312 (i.p.v. 500)
  • Zoeklimiet: 11 (i.p.v. 5)
  • Indexering door zoekmachines staat standaard uitgeschakeld
  • Ongeautoriseerde toegang tot de openbare tijdlijn is niet toegestaan
  • Wij houden geen onnodige gegevens bij

Thema's:

  • Todon (donker - standaard):
    • in de eenvoudige webomgeving met √©√©n kolom hetzelfde als het standaardthema van het Mastodonproject.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving het standaardthema van het Mastodonproject, maar over de volledige breedte en met enkele kleine aanpassingen (compatibel met de meeste schermresoluties, incl. brede schermen).
  • Mastodon (licht):
    • het lichte standaardthema van het Mastodonproject.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving over de volledige breedte, zoals het standaardthema van Todon.eu.
  • Mastodon (hoog contrast):
    • het (donkere) standaardthema van het Mastodonproject in hoog contrast.
    • in de geavanceerde webomgeving over de volledige breedte, zoals het standaardthema van Todon.eu.

Are you looking for our list of silenced and suspended Fediverse servers? Look on our wiki.

Please go to this page if you are a copyright holder and think someone on this website infringed your copyright.

Description:
In questa comunità ci si impegna a:

Rispettare qualunque interlocutore anche quando si contestano affermazioni e azioni altrui, quando si usa un linguaggio ironico.

Assumersi personalmente la responsabilità morale, civile e legale di quello che si fa, si scrive e si pubblica.

In questa comunità si rifiuta e proibisce:

  • La propaganda politica fascista, sovranista, eurosfascista, leghista, populista, neoliberista e rossobruna

  • L’istigazione pubblica alla violenza o all’odio nei confronti di un gruppo di persone, o di un suo membro, definito in riferimento alla razza, al colore, alla religione, all’ascendenza, all’origine nazionale o etnica, a orientamenti sessuali o politici e ad ogni altro genere di criterio discriminatorio.

  • L’apologia, la negazione o la minimizzazione grossolana dei crimini di genocidio, dei crimini contro l’umanità e dei crimini di guerra

  • La promozione di attività commerciali orientate al profitto e prive di valore sociale e culturale

  • La diffusione di contenuti e notizie infondate, false, parziali, manipolate

  • Il negazionismo di fatti storicamente e scientificamente accertati. Ad esempio: l’olocausto c’è stato, la terra non è piatta, non ci sono prove scientifiche del rapporto causale tra vaccini e malattie, il clima sta cambiando per l’intervento umano, l’omeopatia è un placebo senza basi chimiche, fisiche o farmaceutiche.

  • La pseudoscienza, l'antiscienza, la "scienza non ufficiale", la misinformazione e la disinformazione scientifica. Per il progresso e l'innovazione scientifica sono importanti le "eresie", i cambi di paradigma, le ipotesi contrarie al consenso scientifico corrente, ma vanno confrontati con la comunit√† scientifica nel contesto della ricerca e non gettati nel calderone della comunicazione pubblica dove si mischiano a informazioni false e fuorvianti che mettono a rischio la salute altrui. Per questo motivo, chi vuole condividere o pubblicare pseudoscienza, antiscienza o "scienza non ufficiale" in contrasto con la migliore conoscenza scientifica disponibile (espressa nel consenso della comunit√† scientifica, dalle istituzioni accademice e dalle istituzioni sanitarie nazionali e internazionali) pu√≤ farlo in tanti contesti ma non su sociale.network, che non √® un ambiente preposto a distinguere tra disinformazione e innovazione, e non vuole esporre i propri utenti ai rischi della disinformazione sanitaria. Se sono scoperte rivoluzionarie, prima di metterle in giro sui social spiegatele agli esperti fino a quando queste scoperte non saranno confermate da persone qualificate e competenti. Se √® disinformazione scientifica, diffondetela dove vi pare ma non qui, perch√© questo √® uno spazio dove la comunit√† degli utenti pratica l'autodifesa dalla disinformazione per condividere la migliore conoscenza disponibile.

  • L’ingiuria, la diffamazione e in generale atteggiamenti contrari alla legge, alla buona educazione e alla convivenza civile.

  • L'uso di un linguaggio verbale violento, discriminatorio, viziato da stereotipi di genere, razzismo o ‚Äúabilismo‚Äù (l‚Äôuso di disturbi fisici o mentali come insulti o metafore).

  • Il "doxxing", ovvero la pratica di rivelare informazioni personali e private di persone che scelgono di esercitare il diritto umano universale all'anonimato per esprimersi liberamente.

  • L'abuso delle hashtag. Non ci sono algoritmi che vi mandano in tendenza nelle timeline a seconda degli hashtag che usate. Nei toot cerchiamo di usare solo hashtag pertinenti, perch√© aggiungendo hashtag che non c'entrano nulla i contenuti non diventano piu' visibili e si "inquina" il feed dell'hashtag con toot che non c'entrano nulla con l'hashtag in questione, complicando la vita alle altre persone.
Short: Sociale.network √® un ambiente di confronto per pacifisti, anarcolibertari, ecologisti, antimilitaristi, antirazzisti, antifascisti e ogni altro genere di persone che sogna un mondo pulito e solidale

Description:
Fulda.Social

√úber uns / About us

Wir sind eine freundliche Mastodon Instanz f√ºr Fulda, Hessen, Deutschland. Ob Fulderaner oder Sympathifant, jeder ist hier willkommen.

We are a friendly Mastodon instance for Fulda, Hessen, Germany. Wether you are from Fulda or just like it, everyone is welcome here.

Kaffeekasse um die Betriebskosten zu decken:

Regeln / Rules

Auf fulda.social ist die Hauptrichtlinie: Seid nett zueinander.

On fulda.social the main guideline is: Be nice to each other.

Alles weitere siehe unten unter Serverregeln.

Everything else see below within Server rules.

F√∂deration / Federation

Wir m√∂gen Zensur nicht, aber noch weniger m√∂gen wir es, wenn "Freiheit", "Zensur" und √§hnliche Begriffe vorgeschoben werden, um andere Nutzer zu bel√§stigen / beleidigen / anzugreifen. Instanzen von denen aus so etwas passiert, werden von uns entweder stumm geschaltet oder gesperrt werden. (Haben wir deiner Meinung nach eine falsche Entscheidung getroffen? Dann kontaktiere uns!)

We don't like censorship, but we like it even less when "free speech", "censorship" or similar terms are abused to harass/insult/attack other users. Instances from which something like this happens will either be muted or blocked by us. (Do you think we took a wrong decision? Contact us!)

Backups und Verf√ºgbarkeit / Backups and Availability

Es werden t√§gliche Backups der Instanz angelegt.
Fulda.social wird privat in der Freizeit betrieben. Wir behalten uns vor, den Dienst jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gr√ºnden einzuschr√§nken oder zu beenden. Sollte dies der Fall sein, geben wir uns M√ºhe, dies mindestens 3 Monate im Voraus bekannt zu geben.

The instance is backed up daily.
Fulda.social is run privately in our free time. We reserve the right to restrict or terminate the service at any time for legal, technical or financial reasons. If this is the case, we make every reasonable effort to announce this at least 3 month in advance.

Spenden / Donations

fulda.social wird werbe- und trackerfrei in unserer Freizeit zur Verf√ºgung gestellt. Daf√ºr fallen im Moment folgende Kosten an:
fulda.social is provided free of advertising and trackers in our free time. The following costs occur currently for this:

  • Server: 83,48‚Ç¨ monatlich/per month,
  • fulda.social domain: 46.41‚Ç¨ j√§hrlich/per year.

Description:
Organisatorisches

Diese Mastodon Instanz wird von graz.social - Verein zur F√∂rderung ethischer Digitalkultur betrieben. Wir erzielen keinerlei Einnahmen mit dem Angebot und finanzieren uns aus Spenden. Wir behalten uns vor, den Dienst jederzeit aus rechtlichen, technischen oder finanziellen Gr√ºnden einzuschr√§nken oder zu beenden. Dieser Server h√§lt sich an die Vereinbarungen f√ºr Mastodon Serverbetreiber: Server Covenant.

Weitere Informationen zum Verein gibt es auf unserer Internetseite.

Spenden

Unterst√ºtzen kann man uns hier.

Moderation

Diese Instanz wird gemeinschaftlich von mehreren Menschen moderiert, die diese Arbeit rein ehrenamtlich leisten: @oschaumbirne, @linos, @publicvoit und @totoroot

Administration

@ruru4143 und @linos administrieren die Instanz, sprich k√ºmmern sich darum, das alles technisch rund l√§uft.

Empfehlungen und Richtlinien

  • Allgemein gelten die weiter unten angef√ºhrten Serverregeln.

  • Bevor ihr Bilder, Videos oder Ton postet macht Euch bitte Gedanken, ob es einen Mehrwert bietet. Diese brauchen n√§mlich um das hundert- bis zehntausendfache mehr an Speicherplatz. Das verursacht Kosten, die wir als Gemeinschaft tragen m√ºssen. Wenn ihr doch ein Bild hochladet empfehlen wir einen alt-Text hinzuzuf√ºgen.

  • Automatisierte Beitr√§ge und hochfrequente Beitr√§ge sollten nicht gelistet werden (d. h. sie sollten f√ºr alle sichtbar sein, aber nicht in der lokalen Zeitleiste erscheinen), damit die lokale Zeitleiste unserer Instanz ein Ort des Gemeinschaftsdialogs und der menschlichen Interaktion bleibt. Die offiziellen iOS und Android Apps besitzen diese M√∂glichkeit aktuell noch nicht, wegen wir

    • Einsteigern empfehlen, Mastodon zuerst im Browser kennen zu lernen
    • F√ºr iOS Metalab und f√ºr Android Tusky zu verwenden

  • Interpretiert kontr√§re Meinungen anderer so wohlwollend wie m√∂glich. Fragt im Zweifel besser einmal ‚Äûzu viel‚Äú nach, wie etwas gemeint war. Haltet euch vor Augen, dass hinter jedem Blogeintrag, Post, jedem Kommentar usw. ein Mensch steht, der ganz unterschiedlich Lebenserfahrungen gemacht hat

  • Meinungsvielfalt ist ein zentrales Element eines progressiven Diskurses, jedoch l√§sst sich oft kaum vermeiden, dass bei unterschiedlichen Meinungen die Wogen hoch gehen. Wir sind uns bewusst, dass es beinahe zu jeder Angelegenheit zwei v√∂llig widerstreitende Ansichten geben mag. Genau deshalb sollten wir unbedingt R√ºcksicht aufeinander nehmen.

Moderierte Sprachen

Unsere Moderatoren versuchen, unabh√§ngig von politischer Ausrichtung, alle Posts gleichwertig und objektiv entlang unserer Serverregeln zu moderieren. Nat√ºrlich ist das nur f√ºr Sprachen m√∂glich, die wir auch verstehen - daher sind als Sprachen auf unseren Instanzen nur Deutsch und Englisch m√∂glich. Wir behalten uns das Einschr√§nken oder L√∂schen von Nachrichten in anderen Sprachen im Zweifel vor.

Altersgrenze / Minderj√§hrige

Um unsere Dienste verwenden zu d√ºrfen, musst du das 14. Lebensjahr vollendet haben. Siehe dazu auch das Datenschutz-Anpassungsgesetz 2018.

Keine AI / ML Regelung

Es ist untersagt, Daten oder Inhalte von den unten angef√ºhrten Instanzen f√ºr das Training oder die Entwicklung von Modellen der k√ºnstlichen Intelligenz oder des maschinellen Lernens zu verwenden, ohne die ausdr√ºckliche Zustimmung des Urheberrechtsinhabers einzuholen. Jede unbefugte Nutzung von Daten oder Inhalten f√ºr KI/ML-Zwecke wird als Versto√ü gegen das Urheberrecht betrachtet und kann rechtliche Schritte nach sich ziehen.
